Force one or two page breaks before/after the generated box so that the next page is formatted as a left page.
Always force a page break before/after the generated box.
Force one or two page breaks before/after the generated box so that the next page is formatted as a right page.
style.properties.-webkit-column-break-be: Describes the page/column break behavior before the generated box.
Always force a page break before/after the generated box.
Neither force nor forbid a page/column break before/after the generated box.
Avoid a column break before/after the generated box.
Avoid a page break before/after the generated box.
Avoid a page/column break before/after the generated box.
Always force a column break before/after the generated box.
Force one or two page breaks before/after the generated box so that the next page is formatted as a left page.
Always force a page break before/after the generated box.
Force one or two page breaks before/after the generated box so that the next page is formatted as a right page.
style.properties.-webkit-column-break-in: Describes the page/column break behavior inside the generated box.
Neither force nor forbid a page/column break inside the generated box.
Avoid a column break inside the generated box.
Avoid a page break inside the generated box.
Avoid a page/column break inside the generated box.
style.properties.-webkit-column-count.de: Describes the optimal number of columns into which the content of the element will be flowed.
style.properties.-webkit-column-count.va: Determines the number of columns by the 'column-width' property and the element width.
style.properties.-webkit-column-gap.desc: Sets the gap between columns. If there is a column rule between columns, it will appear in the middle of the gap.
style.properties.-webkit-column-gap.valu: User agent specific and typically equivalent to 1em.
style.properties.-webkit-column-rule-col: Sets the color of the column rule
style.properties.-webkit-column-rule-sty: Sets the style of the rule between columns of an element.
style.properties.-webkit-column-rule-wid: Sets the width of the rule between columns. Negative values are not allowed.
style.properties.-webkit-column-rule.des: This property is a shorthand for setting 'column-rule-width', 'column-rule-style', and 'column-rule-color' at the same place in the style sheet. Omitted values are set to their initial values.
style.properties.-webkit-column-span.des: Describes the page/column break behavior after the generated box.
style.properties.-webkit-column-span.val: The element spans across all columns. Content in the normal flow that appears before the element is automatically balanced across all columns before the element appear.
The element does not span multiple columns.
style.properties.-webkit-column-width.de: This property describes the width of columns in multicol elements.
style.properties.-webkit-column-width.va: The width depends on the values of other properties.
style.properties.-webkit-columns.descrip: A shorthand property which sets both 'column-width' and 'column-count'.
The width depends on the values of other properties.
style.properties.-webkit-filter.descript: Processes an element's rendering before it is displayed in the document, by applying one or more filter effects.
style.properties.-webkit-filter.values.b: Applies a Gaussian blur to the input image.
Applies a linear multiplier to input image, making it appear more or less bright.
style.properties.-webkit-filter.values.c: Adjusts the contrast of the input.
style.properties.-webkit-filter.values.d: Applies a drop shadow effect to the input image.
style.properties.-webkit-filter.values.g: Converts the input image to grayscale.
style.properties.-webkit-filter.values.h: Applies a hue rotation on the input image.
style.properties.-webkit-filter.values.i: Inverts the samples in the input image.
style.properties.-webkit-filter.values.o: Applies transparency to the samples in the input image.
style.properties.-webkit-filter.values.s: Converts the input image to sepia.
style.properties.-webkit-filter.values.u: A filter reference to a <filter> element.
style.properties.-webkit-flow-from.descr: Makes a block container a region and associates it with a named flow.
style.properties.-webkit-flow-from.value: The block container is not a CSS Region.
style.properties.-webkit-flow-into.descr: Places an element or its contents into a named flow.
style.properties.-webkit-flow-into.value: The element is not moved to a named flow and normal CSS processing takes place.
style.properties.-webkit-font-feature-se: This property provides low-level control over OpenType font features. It is intended as a way of providing access to font features that are not widely used but are needed for a particular use case.
No change in glyph substitution or positioning occurs.
style.properties.-webkit-hyphens.descrip: Controls whether hyphenation is allowed to create more break opportunities within a line of text.
Conditional hyphenation characters inside a word, if present, take priority over automatic resources when determining hyphenation points within the word.
Words are only broken at line breaks where there are characters inside the word that suggest line break opportunities
Words are not broken at line breaks, even if characters inside the word suggest line break points.
style.properties.-webkit-line-break.desc: Specifies line-breaking rules for CJK (Chinese, Japanese, and Korean) text.
style.properties.-webkit-line-clamp.desc: -webkit-line-clamp CSS 属性可以把块容器中的内容限制为指定的行数。
style.properties.-webkit-line-clamp.valu: This value specifies that the content won't be clamped.
style.properties.-webkit-mask-attachment: 如果使用了 -webkit-mask-image (en-US), -webkit-mask-attachment 将指定蒙版在视口的位置是固定的，还是同包含块一起滚动的。
The non-standard prefixed -webkit-mask-box-image shorthand property sets the mask image for an element's border box.
Used to specify that a border box is to have no mask image.
The mask image is repeated as many times as is necessary to span the border box. May include a partial image if the mask image does not divide evenly into the border box.
The mask image is stretched somewhat and repeated such that there is no partial mask image at the end of the border box.
The mask image is repeated as many times as possible without stretching. There is no partial mask image at the end of the border box.
The mask image is stretched to contain the border box exactly.
style.properties.-webkit-mask-clip.descr: Determines the mask painting area, which determines the area that is affected by the mask.
The -webkit-mask-composite property specifies the manner in which multiple mask images applied to the same element are composited with one another. Mask images are composited in the opposite order that they are declared with the -webkit-mask-image property.
Overlapping pixels in the source mask image and the destination mask image are cleared.
The source mask image replaces the destination mask image.

The pixels of the source mask image are rendered. The pixels of the destination mask image are rendered only if they overlap a nontransparent portion of the destination mask image. This causes the destination mask image to have no effect.
Overlapping pixels in the source mask image and the destination mask image remain the pixels of the destination mask image; all other pixels are cleared.
Overlapping pixels in the source mask image and the destination mask image are cleared; all remaining pixels of the source mask image are rendered.
The destination mask image is rendered over the source mask image.

The pixels of the destination mask image are rendered. The pixels of the source mask image are rendered only if they overlap a nontransparent portion of the destination mask image. This causes the source mask image to have no effect.
Overlapping pixels in the source mask image and the destination mask image are replaced by the pixels of the source mask image; all other pixels are cleared.
Overlapping pixels in the source mask image and the destination mask image are cleared; all remaining pixels of the source mask image are rendered.
The source mask image is rendered over the destination mask image.
Overlapping pixels in the source mask image and the destination mask image become fully transparent if they are both fully opaque.
style.properties.-webkit-mask-image.desc: Sets the mask layer image of an element.
style.properties.-webkit-mask-image.valu: Counts as a transparent black image layer.
Reference to a <mask element or to a CSS image.
style.properties.-webkit-mask-position-x: The -webkit-mask-position-x CSS property sets the initial horizontal position of a mask image.
style.properties.-webkit-mask-position-y: The -webkit-mask-position-y CSS property sets the initial vertical position of a mask image.
style.properties.-webkit-mask-position.d: The mask-position CSS property sets the initial position, relative to the mask position layer defined by mask-origin, for each defined mask image.
style.properties.-webkit-mask-repeat-x.d: The -webkit-mask-repeat-x property specifies whether and how a mask image is repeated (tiled) horizontally.
style.properties.-webkit-mask-repeat-y.d: The -webkit-mask-repeat-y property sets whether and how a mask image is repeated (tiled) vertically.
style.properties.-webkit-mask-repeat.des: Specifies how mask layer images are tiled after they have been sized and positioned.
style.properties.-webkit-mask-size.descr: Specifies the size of the mask layer images.
style.properties.-webkit-mask-size.value: Resolved by using the image's intrinsic ratio and the size of the other dimension, or failing that, using the image's intrinsic size, or failing that, treating it as 100%.
Scale the image, while preserving its intrinsic aspect ratio (if any), to the largest size such that both its width and its height can fit inside the background positioning area.
Scale the image, while preserving its intrinsic aspect ratio (if any), to the smallest size such that both its width and its height can completely cover the background positioning area.
style.properties.-webkit-mask.descriptio: The mask CSS property alters the visibility of an element by either partially or fully hiding it. This is accomplished by either masking or clipping the image at specific points.
style.properties.-webkit-nbsp-mode.descr: Defines the behavior of nonbreaking spaces within text.
style.properties.-webkit-overflow-scroll: -webkit-overflow-scrolling 属性控制元素在移动设备上是否使用滚动回弹效果。
使用普通滚动，当手指从触摸屏上移开，滚动会立即停止。
使用具有回弹效果的滚动，当手指从触摸屏上移开，内容会继续保持一段时间的滚动效果。继续滚动的速度和持续的时间和滚动手势的强烈程度成正比。同时也会创建一个新的堆栈上下文。
style.properties.-webkit-perspective-ori: Establishes the origin for the perspective property. It effectively sets the X and Y position at which the viewer appears to be looking at the children of the element.
style.properties.-webkit-perspective.des: Applies the same transform as the perspective(<number>) transform function, except that it applies only to the positioned or transformed children of the element, not to the transform on the element itself.
style.properties.-webkit-region-fragment: The 'region-fragment' property controls the behavior of the last region associated with a named flow.
Content flows as it would in a regular content box.
If the content fits within the CSS Region, then this property has no effect.
style.properties.-webkit-tap-highlight-c: -webkit-tap-highlight-color 是一个没有标准化的属性，能够设置点击链接的时候出现的高亮颜色。显示给用户的高光是他们成功点击的标识，以及暗示了他们点击的元素。
style.properties.-webkit-text-fill-color: CSS 属性 -webkit-text-fill-color 指定了文本字符的填充颜色。若未设置此属性，则使用 color 属性的值。
style.properties.-webkit-text-security.d: -webkit-text-security is a non-standard CSS property that obfuscates characters in a <form> field (such as <input> or <textarea>) by replacing them with a shape. It only affects fields that are not of type=password.
style.properties.-webkit-text-size-adjus: Specifies a size adjustment for displaying text content in mobile browsers.
Renderers must use the default size adjustment when displaying on a small device.
Renderers must not do size adjustment when displaying on a small device.
style.properties.-webkit-text-stroke-col: CSS 属性 -webkit-text-stroke-color 指定了文本字符的笔触颜色。若未设置此属性，则使用 color 属性的值。
style.properties.-webkit-text-stroke-wid: CSS 属性 -webkit-text-stroke-width 指定了文本的笔触宽度。
style.properties.-webkit-text-stroke.des: CSS 属性 -webkit-text-stroke 指定了文本字符的笔触宽度和笔触颜色。此属性为全称属性 -webkit-text-stroke-width 和 -webkit-text-stroke-color 的简写属性。
style.properties.-webkit-touch-callout.d: -webkit-touch-callout 这个CSS 属性禁用了默认的 callout 展示，callout 是指当触摸并按住一个元素的时候出现的提示。
style.properties.-webkit-touch-callout.v: 此值表示显示默认的 callout
style.properties.-webkit-transform-origi: The x coordinate of the origin for transforms applied to an element with respect to its border box.
The y coordinate of the origin for transforms applied to an element with respect to its border box.
The z coordinate of the origin for transforms applied to an element with respect to its border box.
Establishes the origin of transformation for an element.
style.properties.-webkit-transform-style: Defines how nested elements are rendered in 3D space.
All children of this element are rendered flattened into the 2D plane of the element.
style.properties.-webkit-transform.descr: A two-dimensional transformation is applied to an element through the 'transform' property. This property contains a list of transform functions similar to those allowed by SVG.
style.properties.-webkit-transform.value: Specifies a 2D transformation in the form of a transformation matrix of six values. matrix(a,b,c,d,e,f) is equivalent to applying the transformation matrix [a b c d e f]
Specifies a 3D transformation as a 4x4 homogeneous matrix of 16 values in column-major order.
Specifies a perspective projection matrix.
Specifies a 2D rotation by the angle specified in the parameter about the origin of the element, as defined by the transform-origin property.
Specifies a clockwise 3D rotation by the angle specified in last parameter about the [x,y,z] direction vector described by the first 3 parameters.
Specifies a clockwise rotation by the given angle about the X axis.
Specifies a clockwise rotation by the given angle about the Y axis.
Specifies a clockwise rotation by the given angle about the Z axis.
Specifies a 2D scale operation by the [sx,sy] scaling vector described by the 2 parameters. If the second parameter is not provided, it is takes a value equal to the first.
Specifies a 3D scale operation by the [sx,sy,sz] scaling vector described by the 3 parameters.
Specifies a scale operation using the [sx,1] scaling vector, where sx is given as the parameter.
Specifies a scale operation using the [sy,1] scaling vector, where sy is given as the parameter.
Specifies a scale operation using the [1,1,sz] scaling vector, where sz is given as the parameter.

Specifies a skew transformation along the X and Y axes. The first angle parameter specifies the skew on the X axis. The second angle parameter specifies the skew on the Y axis. If the second parameter is not given then a value of 0 is used for the Y angle (ie: no skew on the Y axis).
Specifies a skew transformation along the X axis by the given angle.
Specifies a skew transformation along the Y axis by the given angle.
Specifies a 2D translation by the vector [tx, ty], where tx is the first translation-value parameter and ty is the optional second translation-value parameter.
Specifies a 3D translation by the vector [tx,ty,tz], with tx, ty and tz being the first, second and third translation-value parameters respectively.
Specifies a translation by the given amount in the X direction.
Specifies a translation by the given amount in the Y direction.
Specifies a translation by the given amount in the Z direction. Note that percentage values are not allowed in the translateZ translation-value, and if present are evaluated as 0.
style.properties.-webkit-transition-dela: Defines when the transition will start. It allows a transition to begin execution some period of time from when it is applied.
style.properties.-webkit-transition-dura: Specifies how long the transition from the old value to the new value should take.
style.properties.-webkit-transition-prop: Specifies the name of the CSS property to which the transition is applied.
Every property that is able to undergo a transition will do so.
style.properties.-webkit-transition-timi: Describes how the intermediate values used during a transition will be calculated.
style.properties.-webkit-transition.desc: Shorthand property combines four of the transition properties into a single property.
style.properties.-webkit-transition.valu: Every property that is able to undergo a transition will do so.
style.properties.-webkit-user-modify.des: Determines whether a user can edit the content of an element.
style.properties.accent-color.descriptio: CSS 属性 accent-color 为某些元素所生成的用户界面控件设置了强调色。
style.properties.accent-color.values.aut: 表示用户代理所选颜色，应匹配平台的强调色（若有）。
style.properties.additive-symbols.descri: @counter-style descriptor. Specifies the symbols used by the marker-construction algorithm specified by the system descriptor. Needs to be specified if the counter system is 'additive'.
style.properties.align-content.descripti: CSS 的 align-content 属性设置了浏览器如何沿着弹性盒子布局的纵轴和网格布局的主轴在内容项之间和周围分配空间。
style.properties.align-content.values.ba:
Specifies participation in first- or last-baseline alignment: aligns the alignment baseline of the box’s first or last baseline set with the corresponding baseline in the shared first or last baseline set of all the boxes in its baseline-sharing group.
      The fallback alignment for first baseline is start, the one for last baseline is end.
style.properties.align-content.values.ce: 所有行朝向容器的中心填充。每行互相紧挨，相对于容器居中对齐。容器的垂直轴起点边和第一行的距离相等于容器的垂直轴终点边和最后一行的距离。
style.properties.align-content.values.en: 所有行从容器的结束边缘开始填充。
style.properties.align-content.values.fl: 所有行从垂直轴末尾开始填充。最后一行的垂直轴终点和容器的垂直轴终点对齐。同时所有后续行与前一个对齐。
所有行从垂直轴起点开始填充。第一行的垂直轴起点边和容器的垂直轴起点边对齐。接下来的每一行紧跟前一行。
style.properties.align-content.values.la:
Specifies participation in first- or last-baseline alignment: aligns the alignment baseline of the box’s first or last baseline set with the corresponding baseline in the shared first or last baseline set of all the boxes in its baseline-sharing group.
      The fallback alignment for first baseline is start, the one for last baseline is end.
style.properties.align-content.values.no: 这些项按默认位置填充，就像没有设置对齐内容值一样。
style.properties.align-content.values.sa: 与对齐关键字一起使用。如果所选的关键字意味着项溢出对齐容器（data loss），则将采用备用策略对项进行对齐，就像启动了 start 对齐模式一样。
style.properties.align-content.values.sp: 所有行沿垂直轴均匀分布在对齐容器内。每对相邻的项之间的间距，主开始边和第一项，以及主结束边和最后一项，都是完全相同的。
style.properties.align-content.values.st: 所有行从容器的起始边缘开始填充。
style.properties.align-content.values.un: 与对齐关键字一起使用。无论元素和对齐容器的相对大小如何、是否会导致一些元素溢出可见范围（data loss），都使用给定的对齐值。
style.properties.align-items.description: CSS align-items 属性将所有直接子节点上的 align-self 值设置为一个组。align-self 属性设置项目在其包含块中在交叉轴方向上的对齐方式。
style.properties.align-items.values.base: 所有元素向基线对齐。侧轴起点到元素基线距离最大的元素将会于侧轴起点对齐以确定基线。
style.properties.align-items.values.cent: 元素在侧轴居中。如果元素在侧轴上的高度高于其容器，那么在两个方向上溢出距离相同。
The item is packed flush to each other toward the end edge of the alignment container in the appropriate axis.
style.properties.align-items.values.firs: 所有元素向基线对齐。侧轴起点到元素基线距离最大的元素将会于侧轴起点对齐以确定基线。
style.properties.align-items.values.last: 所有元素向基线对齐。侧轴起点到元素基线距离最大的元素将会于侧轴起点对齐以确定基线。
style.properties.align-items.values.left: The items are packed flush to each other toward the left edge of the alignment container. If the property’s axis is not parallel with the inline axis, this value behaves like start.
style.properties.align-items.values.norm:
这个关键字的效果取决于我们处在什么布局模式中：
    
      在绝对定位的布局中，对于被替代的绝对定位盒子，这个效果和start?的效果的一样；对于其他所有绝对定位的盒子，这个效果和stretch的效果一样。
      在绝对定位布局的静态位置上，效果和stretch一样。
      对于那些弹性项目而言，效果和stretch一样。
      对于那些网格项目而言，效果和stretch一样，除了有部分比例或者一个固定大小的盒子的效果像start。
      这个属性不适用于块级盒子和表格。
style.properties.align-items.values.righ: The items are packed flush to each other toward the right edge of the alignment container in the appropriate axis. If the property’s axis is not parallel with the inline axis, this value behaves like start.
style.properties.align-items.values.safe: Used alongside an alignment keyword. If the chosen keyword means that the item overflows the alignment container causing data loss, the item is instead aligned as if the alignment mode were start.
style.properties.align-items.values.self: The item is packed flush to the edge of the alignment container of the end side of the item, in the appropriate axis.
The items is packed flush to the edge of the alignment container of the start side of the item, in the appropriate axis.
style.properties.align-items.values.star: The item is packed flush to each other toward the start edge of the alignment container in the appropriate axis.
style.properties.align-items.values.unsa: Used alongside an alignment keyword. Regardless of the relative sizes of the item and alignment container and whether overflow which causes data loss might happen, the given alignment value is honored.
style.properties.align-self.description: CSS 属性 align-self 会对齐当前 grid 或 flex 行中的元素，并覆盖已有的 align-items 的值。In Grid, it aligns the item inside the grid area. 在 Flexbox 中，会按照 cross axis（当前 flex 元素排列方向的垂直方向）进行排列。
设置为父元素的 align-items 值。
style.properties.align-self.values.cente: flex 元素会对齐到 cross-axis 的中间，如果该元素的 cross-size 尺寸大于 flex 容器，将在两个方向均等溢出。
style.properties.align-self.values.first:
Specifies participation in first- or last-baseline alignment: aligns the alignment baseline of the box’s first or last baseline set with the corresponding baseline in the shared first or last baseline set of all the boxes in its baseline-sharing group.
      The fallback alignment for first baseline is start, the one for last baseline is end.
      flex 元素将会基于容器的宽和高，按照自身 margin box 的 cross-size 拉伸。If the combined size of the items along the cross axis is less than the size of the alignment container and the item is auto-sized, its size is increased equally (not proportionally), while still respecting the constraints imposed by max-height/max-width (or equivalent functionality), so that the combined size of all auto-sized items exactly fills the alignment container along the cross axis.
style.properties.align-self.values.flex-: flex 元素会对齐到 cross-axis 的尾端。
flex 元素会对齐到 cross-axis 的首端。
style.properties.align-self.values.last:
Specifies participation in first- or last-baseline alignment: aligns the alignment baseline of the box’s first or last baseline set with the corresponding baseline in the shared first or last baseline set of all the boxes in its baseline-sharing group.
      The fallback alignment for first baseline is start, the one for last baseline is end.
      flex 元素将会基于容器的宽和高，按照自身 margin box 的 cross-size 拉伸。If the combined size of the items along the cross axis is less than the size of the alignment container and the item is auto-sized, its size is increased equally (not proportionally), while still respecting the constraints imposed by max-height/max-width (or equivalent functionality), so that the combined size of all auto-sized items exactly fills the alignment container along the cross axis.
style.properties.align-self.values.norma:
效果取决于当前的布局模式：
    
      绝对定位布局中，normal 在绝对定位的替代元素上表现为start，在所有其他绝对定位元素上表现为stretch。
      在绝对定位的静态元素上表现为stretch。
      flex 布局中表现为 stretch。
      For grid items, this keyword leads to a behavior similar to the one of stretch, except for boxes with an aspect ratio or an intrinsic sizes where it behaves like start.
      在块级和表格单元中无效。
If the size of the item overflows the alignment container, the item is instead aligned as if the alignment mode were start.
style.properties.align-self.values.self-: Aligns the items to be flush with the edge of the alignment container corresponding to the item's end side in the cross axis.
Aligns the items to be flush with the edge of the alignment container corresponding to the item's start side in the cross axis.
style.properties.align-self.values.stret: If the cross size property of the flex item computes to auto, and neither of the cross-axis margins are auto, the flex item is stretched.
style.properties.align-self.values.unsaf: Regardless of the relative sizes of the item and alignment container, the given alignment value is honored.
style.properties.align-tracks.descriptio: The align-tracks CSS property sets the alignment in the masonry axis for grid containers that have masonry in their block axis.
style.properties.align-tracks.values.bas:
Specifies participation in first- or last-baseline alignment: aligns the alignment baseline of the box's first or last baseline set with the corresponding baseline in the shared first or last baseline set of all the boxes in its baseline-sharing group.
      The fallback alignment for first baseline is start, the one for last baseline is end.
style.properties.align-tracks.values.cen: The items are packed flush to each other toward the center of the alignment container along the masonry axis.
style.properties.align-tracks.values.end: The items are packed flush to each other toward the end edge of the alignment container in the masonry axis.
style.properties.align-tracks.values.las:
Specifies participation in first- or last-baseline alignment: aligns the alignment baseline of the box's first or last baseline set with the corresponding baseline in the shared first or last baseline set of all the boxes in its baseline-sharing group.
      The fallback alignment for first baseline is start, the one for last baseline is end.
style.properties.align-tracks.values.spa: The items are evenly distributed within the alignment container along the masonry axis. The spacing between each pair of adjacent items is the same. The empty space before the first and after the last item equals half of the space between each pair of adjacent items.

The items are evenly distributed within the alignment container along the masonry axis. The spacing between each pair of adjacent items is the same. The first item is flush with the main-start edge, and the last item is flush with the main-end edge.

The items are evenly distributed within the alignment container along the masonry axis. The spacing between each pair of adjacent items, the main-start edge and the first item, and the main-end edge and the last item, are all exactly the same.
style.properties.align-tracks.values.sta: The items are packed flush to each other toward the start edge of the alignment container in the masonry axis.
style.properties.align-tracks.values.str: The items stretch along the masonry axis to fill the content box. Items with definite size do not stretch.
style.properties.all.description: CSS all 简写属性 将除了 unicode-bidi 与 direction 之外的所有属性重设至其初始值，或继承值。
style.properties.all.values.inherit.desc: 该关键字代表改变该元素或其父元素的所有属性的值至他们的父元素属性的值。inherited values
style.properties.all.values.initial.desc: 该关键字代表改变该元素或其父元素的所有属性至初始值。
style.properties.all.values.revert-layer: Specifies that all the element's properties should roll back the cascade to a previous cascade layer, if one exists. If no other cascade layer exists, the element's properties will roll back to the matching rule, if one exists, in the current layer or to a previous style origin.
style.properties.all.values.revert.descr:
指定依赖于声明所属的样式表原点的行为：
    
      User-agent origin
      
        相当于 unset
      
      User origin
      
        将层叠回滚到用户代理级别，以便计算指定的值，就好像没有为该元素指定作者级别或用户级别规则。
      
      Author origin
      
        将层叠回滚到用户级别，以便计算指定的值，就好像没有为元素指定作者级规则。出于revert的目的，“作者”原点包括“覆盖”和“动画”原点。
style.properties.all.values.unset.descri: 该关键字代表如果该元素的属性的值是可继承的，则改变该元素或该元素的父元素的所有属性的值为他们父元素的属性值，反之则改变为初始值。
style.properties.alt.description: Provides alternative text for assistive technology to replace the generated content of a ::before or ::after element.
style.properties.animation-composition.d: The animation-composition CSS property specifies the composite operation to use when multiple animations affect the same property simultaneously.
style.properties.animation-composition.v: The effect and underlying values are combined. For animation types where the addition operation is not commutative, the order of the operands is the underlying value followed by the effect value.

The effect value builds on the underlying value of the property. This operation produces an additive effect. For animation types where the addition operation is not commutative, the order of the operands is the underlying value followed by the effect value.
The effect value overrides the underlying value of the property. This is the default value.
style.properties.animation-delay.descrip: animation-delay CSS 属性指定从应用动画到元素开始执行动画之前等待的时间量。动画可以稍后开始、立即从开头开始或立即开始并在动画中途播放。
style.properties.animation-direction.des: animation-direction CSS 属性设置动画是应正向播放、反向播放还是在正向和反向之间交替播放。
style.properties.animation-direction.val: 动画在每个循环中正反交替播放，第一次迭代是反向播放。确定循环是奇数还是偶数的计数从 1 开始。
动画在每个循环中正反交替播放，第一次迭代是正向播放。确定循环是奇数还是偶数的计数从 1 开始。
动画在每个循环中正向播放。换句话说，每次动画循环时，动画将重置为起始状态并重新开始。这是默认值。
动画在每个循环中反向播放。换句话说，每次动画循环时，动画将重置为结束状态并重新开始。动画步骤将反向执行，并且时间函数也将被反转。例如，ease-in 时间函数变为 ease-out。
style.properties.animation-duration.desc: animation-duration CSS 属性设置动画完成一个动画周期所需的时间。
style.properties.animation-duration.valu: For time-based animations, auto is equivalent to a value of 0s (see below). For CSS scroll-driven animations, auto fills the entire timeline with the animation.
style.properties.animation-fill-mode.des: CSS 属性 animation-fill-mode 设置 CSS 动画在执行之前和之后如何将样式应用于其目标。
style.properties.animation-fill-mode.val:
动画将在应用于目标时立即应用第一个关键帧中定义的值，并在animation-delay期间保留此值。第一个关键帧取决于animation-direction的值：
    
      
        
          animation-direction
          first relevant keyframe
        
      
      
        
          normal or alternate
          0% or from
        
        
          reverse or alternate-reverse
          100% or to
动画将遵循forwards和backwards的规则，从而在两个方向上扩展动画属性。

目标将保留由执行期间遇到的最后一个关键帧 (en-US)计算值。最后一个关键帧取决于animation-direction和animation-iteration-count的值：
    
      
        
          animation-direction
          animation-iteration-count
          last keyframe encountered
        
      
      
        
          normal
          even or odd
          100% or to
        
        
          reverse
          even or odd
          0% or from
        
        
          alternate
          even
          0% or from
        
        
          alternate
          odd
          100% or to
        
        
          alternate-reverse
          even
          100% or to
        
        
          alternate-reverse
          odd
          0% or from
当动画未执行时，动画将不会将任何样式应用于目标，而是已经赋予给该元素的 CSS 规则来显示该元素。这是默认值。
style.properties.animation-iteration-cou: animation-iteration-count CSS 属性设置动画序列在停止前应播放的次数
style.properties.animation-name.descript: animation-name CSS 属性指定一个或多个 @keyframes at-rule 的名称，这些 at-rule 描述了要应用于元素的动画。多个 @keyframes at-rule 以逗号分隔的名称列表的形式指定。如果指定的名称不匹配任何 @keyframes at-rule，则不会对任何属性进行动画处理。
style.properties.animation-name.values.n: 一个特殊的关键字，表示没有关键帧。它可用于禁用动画，而不改变其他标识符的顺序，或禁用级联的动画。
style.properties.animation-play-state.de: animation-play-state CSS 属性设置动画是运行还是暂停。
style.properties.animation-range-end.des: The animation-range-end CSS property is used to set the end of an animation's attachment range along its timeline, i.e. where along the timeline an animation will end.
style.properties.animation-range-start.d: The animation-range-start CSS property is used to set the start of an animation's attachment range along its timeline, i.e. where along the timeline an animation will start.
style.properties.animation-range.descrip: The animation-range CSS shorthand property is used to set the start and end of an animation's attachment range along its timeline, i.e. where along the timeline an animation will start and end.
Represents the range of a named view progress timeline where the subject element is fully contained by, or fully contains, the scroll port's view progress visibility range.
        
          If the subject element is smaller than the scrollport, it ranges from the point where the subject element is first completely contained by the scroll port (0% progress), to the point where it is no longer completely contained by the scroll port (100% progress).
          If the subject element is larger than the scrollport, it ranges from the point where the subject element first completely covers the scroll port (0% progress), to the point where it no longer completely covers the scroll port (100% progress).

Represents the full range of a named view progress timeline (see CSS scroll-driven animations for more details), from the point where the subject element first starts to enter the scroll port's view progress visibility range (0% progress) to the point where it has completely left it (100% progress).

Represents the range of a named view progress timeline from the point where the subject element first starts to cross the scroll port's starting edge (0% progress), to the point where it has completely crossed the scroll port's starting edge (100%).

Represents the range of a named view progress timeline from the point where the subject element first starts to enter the scroll port (0% progress), to the point where it has completely entered the scroll port (100%).

Represents the range of a named view progress timeline from the point where the subject element first starts to cross the scroll port's end edge (0% progress), to the point where it has completely crossed the scroll port's end edge (100%).

Represents the range of a named view progress timeline from the point where the subject element first starts to exit the scroll port (0% progress), to the point where it has completely exited the scroll port (100%).
Represents the start of the timeline in the case of animation-range-start and the end of the timeline in the case of animation-range-end. This is the default value.
style.properties.animation-timeline.desc: The animation-timeline CSS property specifies the timeline that is used to control the progress of a CSS animation.
style.properties.animation-timeline.valu: The animation's timeline is the document's default DocumentTimeline.
The animation is not associated with a timeline.

An anonymous scroll progress timeline is provided by some ancestor scroller of the current element. The function parameters allow you to select the scroller, and the scrolling axis the timeline will be measured along.
    See scroll() for more information.

An anonymous view progress timeline is provided by the subject that animation-timeline: view(); is set on. The function parameters allow you to select the scrollbar axis along which timeline progress will be tracked and an inset that adjusts the position of the box in which the subject is deemed to be visible.
    See view() for more information.
style.properties.animation-timing-functi: animation-timing-function CSS 属性设置动画在每个周期的持续时间内如何进行。
开发者自定义的三次贝塞尔曲线，其中 p1 和 p3 的值必须在 0 到 1 的范围内。
等同于 cubic-bezier(0.42, 0, 0.58, 1.0)，表示动画属性一开始缓慢变化，随后加速变化，最后再次减速变化。
等同于 cubic-bezier(0.42, 0, 1.0, 1.0)，表示动画一开始较慢，随着动画属性的变化逐渐加速，直至完成。
等同于 cubic-bezier(0, 0, 0.58, 1.0)，表示动画一开始较快，随着动画的进行逐渐减速。
等同于 cubic-bezier(0.25, 0.1, 0.25, 1.0)，即默认值，表示动画在中间加速，在结束时减速。。
在 0% 和 100% 标记处停留，有效地在动画迭代过程中添加一个步骤。
表示一个右连续函数，因此最后一个跳跃发生在动画结束时。
两端都没有跳跃。相反，在 0% 和 100% 标记处分别停留，每个停留点的持续时间为总动画时间的 1/n。
表示一个左连续函数，因此第一个跳跃发生在动画开始时。
等同于 cubic-bezier(0.0, 0.0, 1.0, 1.0)，表示动画以匀速运动。

按照 n 个定格在过渡中显示动画迭代，每个定格等长时间显示。例如，如果 n 为 5，则有 5 个步骤。动画是否在 0%、20%、40%、60% 和 80% 处或 20%、40%、60%、80% 和 100% 处暂停，或者在动画的 0% 和 100% 之间设置 5 个定格，又或是在包括 0% 和 100% 的情况下设置 5 个定格（在 0%、25%、50%、75% 和 100% 处）取决于使用以下跳跃项之一：
    
      jump-start
      
        表示一个左连续函数，因此第一个跳跃发生在动画开始时。
      
      jump-end
      
        表示一个右连续函数，因此最后一个跳跃发生在动画结束时。
      
      jump-none
      
        两端都没有跳跃。相反，在 0% 和 100% 标记处分别停留，每个停留点的持续时间为总动画时间的 1/n。
      
      jump-both
      
        在 0% 和 100% 标记处停留，有效地在动画迭代过程中添加一个步骤。
      
      start
      
        等同于 jump-start。
      
      end
      
        等同于 jump-end。
      
      step-start
      
        等同于 steps(1, jump-start)。
      
      step-end
      
        等同于 steps(1, jump-end)。
style.properties.animation.description: CSS animation 属性是 animation-name，animation-duration, animation-timing-function，animation-delay，animation-iteration-count，animation-direction，animation-fill-mode 和 animation-play-state 属性的一个简写属性形式。
style.properties.animation.values.altern: The animation cycle iterations that are odd counts are played in the reverse direction, and the animation cycle iterations that are even counts are played in a normal direction.
The animation cycle iterations that are odd counts are played in the normal direction, and the animation cycle iterations that are even counts are played in a reverse direction.
style.properties.animation.values.backwa: The beginning property value (as defined in the first @keyframes at-rule) is applied before the animation is displayed, during the period defined by 'animation-delay'.
style.properties.animation.values.both.d: Both forwards and backwards fill modes are applied.
style.properties.animation.values.forwar: The final property value (as defined in the last @keyframes at-rule) is maintained after the animation completes.
style.properties.animation.values.infini: Causes the animation to repeat forever.
style.properties.animation.values.revers: All iterations of the animation are played in the reverse direction from the way they were specified.
style.properties.appearance.description: appearance CSS 属性用于控制 UI 控件的基于操作系统主题的原生外观。
style.properties.appearance.values.-appl: 仅适用于 iOS 和 macOS。从 iOS 10.1 和 macOS 10.12 开始，在 Web 上可用。
用户代理根据元素选择适当的特殊样式。对于没有特殊样式的元素，其行为类似于 none。
style.properties.appearance.values.butto: 该元素曾经被绘制为一个按钮。
style.properties.appearance.values.check: 该元素的外观类似于复选框的容器，可能包括在某些平台下的光照预设背景效果。通常它会包含一个标签和一个复选框。
该元素曾经被绘制为一个复选框，包括实际的“复选框”部分。
style.properties.appearance.values.menul: 该元素被样式化为下拉列表的文本字段。（未在 Windows 平台上实现）
隐藏部件的某些特性，例如 select 元素中显示的指示列表可以展开的箭头。
style.properties.appearance.values.progr: 该元素的样式类似于进度条。可以使用 progress-bar 样式来实现
style.properties.appearance.values.radio: 该元素曾经被绘制为单选按钮，包括实际的“单选按钮”部分。
style.properties.appearance.values.searc: 可以在 Windows 7 上的 Chrome 51 上使用。
style.properties.ascent-override.descrip: Describes the ascent metric of a font.
style.properties.aspect-ratio.descriptio: CSS 属性 aspect-ratio 为盒子规定了首选纵横比，这个纵横比可以用于计算 auto 尺寸以及其他布局函数。
style.properties.aspect-ratio.values.aut: 具有固有纵横比的可替换元素将使用此纵横比，否则盒子无首选纵横比。涉及固有纵横比的尺寸计算始终使用内容盒的尺寸。
style.properties.azimuth.description: In combination with elevation, the azimuth CSS property enables different audio sources to be positioned spatially for aural presentation. This is important in that it provides a natural way to tell several voices apart, as each can be positioned to originate at a different location on the sound stage. Stereo output produce a lateral sound stage, while binaural headphones and multi-speaker setups allow for a fully three-dimensional stage.
style.properties.backdrop-filter.descrip: backdrop-filter CSS 属性可以让你为一个元素后面区域添加图形效果（如模糊或颜色偏移）。因为它适用于元素背后的所有元素，为了看到效果，必须使元素或其背景至少部分透明。
没有应用于背景的滤镜。
style.properties.backface-visibility.des: CSS 属性 backface-visibility 指定当元素背面朝向观察者时是否可见。
style.properties.backface-visibility.val: 背面朝向用户时不可见。
style.properties.background-attachment.d: background-attachment CSS 属性决定背景图像的位置是在视口内固定，或者随着包含它的区块滚动。
style.properties.background-attachment.v: 此关键属性值表示背景相对于视口固定。即使一个元素拥有滚动机制，背景也不会随着元素的内容滚动。
此关键属性值表示背景相对于元素的内容固定。如果一个元素拥有滚动机制，背景将会随着元素的内容滚动，并且背景的绘制区域和定位区域是相对于可滚动的区域而不是包含他们的边框。
此关键属性值表示背景相对于元素本身固定，而不是随着它的内容滚动（对元素边框是有效的）。
style.properties.background-blend-mode.d: background-blend-mode CSS 属性定义该元素的背景图片，以及背景色如何混合。
style.properties.background-blend-mode.v: Darkens the backdrop color to reflect the source color.
Brightens the backdrop color to reflect the source color.
Creates a color with the hue and saturation of the source color and the luminosity of the backdrop color.
Selects the darker of the backdrop and source colors.
Subtracts the darker of the two constituent colors from the lighter color..
Produces an effect similar to that of the Difference mode but lower in contrast.
Multiplies or screens the colors, depending on the source color value.
Creates a color with the hue of the source color and the saturation and luminosity of the backdrop color.
Selects the lighter of the backdrop and source colors.
Creates a color with the luminosity of the source color and the hue and saturation of the backdrop color.
The source color is multiplied by the destination color and replaces the destination.
Default attribute which specifies no blending
Multiplies or screens the colors, depending on the backdrop color value.
Creates a color with the saturation of the source color and the hue and luminosity of the backdrop color.
Multiplies the complements of the backdrop and source color values, then complements the result.
Darkens or lightens the colors, depending on the source color value.
style.properties.background-clip.descrip: background-clip 设置元素的背景（背景图片或颜色）是否延伸到边框、内边距盒子、内容盒子下面。
背景延伸至边框外沿（但是在边框下层）。
背景被裁剪至内容区（content box）外沿。
背景延伸至内边距（padding）外沿。不会绘制到边框处。
背景被裁剪成文字的前景色。
style.properties.background-color.descri: CSS属性中的 background-color 会设置元素的背景色，属性的值为颜色值或关键字"transparent"二者选其一。
style.properties.background-image.descri: CSS background-image 属性用于为一个元素设置一个或者多个背景图像。
style.properties.background-image.values: 是一个表示无背景图的关键字。
style.properties.background-origin.descr: background-origin 规定了指定背景图片background-image 属性的原点位置的背景相对区域。
style.properties.background-origin.value: 背景图片的摆放以 border 区域为参考
背景图片的摆放以 content 区域为参考
背景图片的摆放以 padding 区域为参考
style.properties.background-position-x.d: background-position-x CSS 属性设置水平方向的位置，与每个背景图片等位置层设置属性 background-origin相关。更多信息请查看background-position属性，这个用的比较普遍。
style.properties.background-position-x.v: 在位置层上相对于中间点的位置。
在位置层上相对于左边的位置。
在位置层上相对于右边的位置。
style.properties.background-position-y.d: background-position-y 属性用于设置初始状态时背景图片在垂直方向上的位置，这个位置相对于通过 background-origin 定义的背景层的原点进行定位。需要获得更多的信息可以查看background-position 属性，这个属性已经得到了长久且广泛的支持。
style.properties.background-position-y.v: 将背景图片的下边界与背景位置层的下边界对齐。
将背景图片垂直方向上的中线与背景位置层的垂直方向中线对齐。
将背景图片的上边界与背景位置层的上边界对齐。
style.properties.background-position.des: background-position CSS 属性为每一个背景图片设置初始位置。这个位置是相对于由 background-origin 定义的位置图层的。
style.properties.background-repeat.descr: background-repeat CSS 属性定义背景图像的重复方式。背景图像可以沿着水平轴，垂直轴，两个轴重复，或者根本不重复。
style.properties.background-size.descrip: background-size 设置背景图片大小。图片可以保有其原有的尺寸，或者拉伸到新的尺寸，或者在保持其原有比例的同时缩放到元素的可用空间的尺寸。
图像如果有两个长度，则按这个尺寸。如果没有固有尺寸与固有比例，则按背景区的大小。如果没有固有尺寸但是有固有比例，效果同 contain。如果有一个长度与比例，则由此长度与比例计算大小。如果有一个长度但是没有比例，则使用此长度与背景区相应的长度。
如果图像有固有比例，则指定的长度使用指定值，未指定的长度由指定值与固有比例计算。如果图像没有固有比例，则指定的长度使用指定值，未指定的长度使用图像相应的固有长度，若没有固有长度，则使用背景区相应的长度。
背景图片按指定大小渲染。
保留固有比例，最大的包含或覆盖背景区。如果图像没有固有比例，则按背景区大小。
保留固有比例，最大的包含或覆盖背景区。如果图像没有固有比例，则按背景区大小。
style.properties.background.description: background 是一种 CSS 简写属性，用于一次性集中定义各种背景属性，包括 color, image, origin 与 size, repeat 方式等等。
style.properties.background.values.fixed: The background is fixed with regard to the viewport. In paged media where there is no viewport, a 'fixed' background is fixed with respect to the page box and therefore replicated on every page.
style.properties.background.values.local: The background is fixed with regard to the element's contents: if the element has a scrolling mechanism, the background scrolls with the element's contents.
A value of 'none' counts as an image layer but draws nothing.
style.properties.background.values.scrol: The background is fixed with regard to the element itself and does not scroll with its contents. (It is effectively attached to the element's border.)
style.properties.base-palette.descriptio: The base-palette CSS descriptor is used to specify the name or index of a pre-defined palette to be used for creating a new palette. If the specified base-palette does not exist, then the palette defined at index 0 will be used.
style.properties.behavior.description: IE only. Used to extend behaviors of the browser.
style.properties.bleed.description: The bleed CSS at-rule descriptor, used with the @page at-rule, specifies the extent of the page bleed area outside the page box. This property only has effect if crop marks are enabled using the marks property.
style.properties.block-size.description: CSS 属性 block-size 根据元素的书写模式定义了元素块的横向或纵向尺寸。根据 writing-mode 的值，此属性对应于 width 或 height 属性。
Depends on the values of other properties.
style.properties.border-block-color.desc: CSS 属性 border-block-color 定义了元素的逻辑块向的边框颜色，并根据元素的书写模式、行内方向和文本朝向对应至实体边框颜色。根据 writing-mode、direction 和 text-orientation 所定义的值，此属性对应于 border-top-color 和 border-bottom-color，或者 border-right-color 和 border-left-color 属性。
CSS 属性 border-block-end-color 定义了元素的逻辑块末的边框颜色，并根据元素的书写模式、行内方向和文本朝向对应至实体边框颜色。根据 writing-mode、direction 和 text-orientation 所定义的值，此属性对应于 border-top-color、border-right-color、border-bottom-color 或 border-left-color 属性。
CSS 属性 border-block-end-style 定义了元素的逻辑块末的边框线型，并根据元素的书写模式、行内方向和文本朝向对应至实体边框线型。根据 writing-mode、direction 和 text-orientation 所定义的值，此属性对应于 border-top-style、border-right-style、border-bottom-style 或 border-left-style 属性。
CSS 属性 border-block-end-width 定义了元素的逻辑块末的边框宽度，并根据元素的书写模式、行内方向和文本朝向对应至实体边框宽度。根据 writing-mode、direction 和 text-orientation 所定义的值，此属性对应于 border-top-width、border-right-width、border-bottom-width 或 border-left-width 属性。
style.properties.border-block-end.descri: CSS 属性 border-block-end 为简写属性，用于在样式表中的某处同时设置逻辑块末边框的各属性值。
style.properties.border-block-start-colo: CSS 属性 border-block-start-color 定义了元素的逻辑块首的边框颜色，并根据元素的书写模式、行内方向和文本朝向对应至实体边框颜色。根据 writing-mode、direction 和 text-orientation 所定义的值，此属性对应于 border-top-color、border-right-color、border-bottom-color 或 border-left-color 属性。
style.properties.border-block-start-styl: CSS 属性 border-block-start-style 定义了元素的逻辑块首的边框线型，并根据元素的书写模式、行内方向和文本朝向对应至实体边框线型。根据 writing-mode、direction 和 text-orientation 所定义的值，此属性对应于 border-top-style、border-right-style、border-bottom-style 或 border-left-style 属性。
style.properties.border-block-start-widt: CSS 属性 border-block-start-width 定义了元素的逻辑块首的边框宽度，并根据元素的书写模式、行内方向和文本朝向对应至实体边框宽度。根据 writing-mode、direction 和 text-orientation 所定义的值，此属性对应于 border-top-width、border-right-width、border-bottom-width 或 border-left-width 属性。
style.properties.border-block-start.desc: CSS 属性 border-block-start 为简写属性，用于在样式表中的某处同时设置逻辑块首边框的各属性值。
style.properties.border-block-style.desc: CSS 属性 border-block-style 定义了元素的逻辑块向的边框线型，并根据元素的书写模式、行内方向和文本朝向对应至实体边框线型。根据 writing-mode、direction 和 text-orientation 所定义的值，此属性对应于 border-top-style 和 border-bottom-style，或者 border-left-style 和 border-right-style 属性。
style.properties.border-block-width.desc: CSS 属性 border-block-width 定义了元素的逻辑块向的边框宽度，并根据元素的书写模式、行内方向和文本朝向对应至实体边框宽度。根据 writing-mode、direction 和 text-orientation 所定义的值，此属性对应于 border-top-width 和 border-bottom-width，或者 border-left-width 和 border-right-width 属性。
style.properties.border-block.descriptio: CSS 属性 border-block 为简写属性，用于在样式表中的某处同时设置逻辑块向边框的各属性值。
style.properties.border-bottom-color.des: border-bottom-color 属性设置一个元素底部边框的颜色。应当指出，在多数情况下，CSS 简写属性 border-color 或 border-bottom 更方便实用。
style.properties.border-bottom-color.val: 一个代表父元素底边颜色的关键字（可能和 border-bottom-color 默认值不同）
style.properties.border-bottom-left-radi: border-bottom-left-radius 这个 css 属性设置元素左下角的圆角。圆角可以是圆或椭圆（注：应为圆或椭圆的一部分），或者当其中一个值为 0 时，圆角将不被设置，这时这个角将展示为直角。
style.properties.border-bottom-right-rad: The border-bottom-right-radius CSS property rounds the bottom-right corner of an element by specifying the radius (or the radius of the semi-major and semi-minor axes) of the ellipse defining the curvature of the corner.
style.properties.border-bottom-style.des: The border-bottom-style CSS property sets the line style of an element's bottom border.
style.properties.border-bottom-width.des: CSS 属性 border-bottom-width 设置一个元素的底部边框宽度。
style.properties.border-bottom.descripti: border-bottom 简写属性把下边框的所有属性：border-bottom-color，border-bottom-style 与 border-bottom-width 设置到了一个声明中。这些属性描述了元素的下边框样式。
style.properties.border-collapse.descrip: border-collapse CSS 属性是用来决定表格的边框是分开的还是合并的。在分隔模式下，相邻的单元格都拥有独立的边框。在合并模式下，相邻单元格共享边框。
相邻的单元格共用同一条边框（采用 collapsed-border 表格渲染模型）。
默认值。每个单元格拥有独立的边框（采用 separated-border 表格渲染模型）。
style.properties.border-color.descriptio: CSS 属性 border-color 是一个用于设置元素四个边框颜色的快捷属性： border-top-color、border-right-color、border-bottom-color、border-left-color。
style.properties.border-color.values.bot: 使用 <color> 来表示下边框的颜色，仅用于三值或四值语法。
style.properties.border-color.values.col: 使用 <color> 来表示四个边框的颜色，仅用于单值语法。
style.properties.border-color.values.hor: 使用 <color> 来表示水平（左边框和右边框）边框的颜色，仅用于双值语法。
style.properties.border-color.values.inh: 这是一个关键词，用于指示四边的颜色值均继承自父元素的计算值。
style.properties.border-color.values.lef: 使用 <color> 来表示左边框的颜色，仅用于四值语法。
style.properties.border-color.values.rig: 使用 <color> 来表示右边框的颜色，仅用于四值语法。
style.properties.border-color.values.top: 使用 <color> 来表示上边框的颜色，仅用于三值或四值语法。
style.properties.border-color.values.ver: 使用 <color> 来表示垂直（上边框和下边框）边框的颜色，仅用于双值或三值语法。
style.properties.border-end-end-radius.d: CSS 属性 border-end-end-radius 定义了元素的逻辑边框半径，并根据元素的书写模式、行内方向和文本朝向对应至实体边框半径。此属性便于构建适应各种文本朝向和书写模式的样式。
style.properties.border-end-start-radius: CSS 属性 border-end-start-radius 定义了元素的逻辑边框半径，并根据元素的书写模式、行内方向和文本朝向对应至实体边框半径。此属性便于构建适应各种文本朝向和书写模式的样式。
style.properties.border-image-outset.des: border-image-outset 属性定义边框图像可超出边框盒的大小。
style.properties.border-image-outset.val: 四个方向的值都继承于父元素的该属性计算后值。
style.properties.border-image-repeat.des: border-image-repeat 定义图片如何填充边框。或为单个值，设置所有的边框；或为两个值，分别设置水平与垂直的边框。
style.properties.border-image-repeat.val: 继承父级元素的计算值。
平铺图像。当不能整数次平铺时，根据情况放大或缩小图像。
平铺图像。当不能整数次平铺时，会用空白间隙填充在图像周围（不会放大或缩小图像）
style.properties.border-image-slice.desc: border-image-slice CSS 属性将使用 border-image-source 引用的图像划分为多个区域。这些区域组成了一个元素的边框图像。
style.properties.border-image-slice.valu: 保留图像的中心区域并将其作为背景图像显示出来，但其会堆叠在 background 之上。它的宽度和高度分别对应顶部和左侧图像切片的宽度和高度。
style.properties.border-image-source.des: CSS 属性 border-image-source 用于声明元素的边框图片（border-image）的资源
style.properties.border-image-source.val: 不会使用图片边框。会被border-style属性所设置的边框样式替换掉
style.properties.border-image-width.desc: CSS属性 border-image-width 指定了 边界图像 (border image) 的宽度
style.properties.border-image-width.valu: 将等同于内部对应的 border-image-slice 的宽或高（可用的话）。如果图像没有需要的相应的属性，将相对于 border-width 进行指定。
style.properties.border-image.descriptio: border-image CSS 属性允许在元素的边框上绘制图像。这使得绘制复杂的外观组件更加简单，也不用在某些情况下使用九宫格了。使用 border-image 时，其将会替换掉border-style 属性所设置的边框样式。虽然规范要求使用 border-image 时边框样式必须存在，但一些浏览器可能没有实现这一点。
style.properties.border-image.values.aut: If 'auto' is specified then the border image width is the intrinsic width or height (whichever is applicable) of the corresponding image slice. If the image does not have the required intrinsic dimension then the corresponding border-width is used instead.
style.properties.border-image.values.fil: Causes the middle part of the border-image to be preserved.
style.properties.border-image.values.rep: The image is tiled (repeated) to fill the area.
style.properties.border-image.values.rou: The image is tiled (repeated) to fill the area. If it does not fill the area with a whole number of tiles, the image is rescaled so that it does.
style.properties.border-image.values.spa: The image is tiled (repeated) to fill the area. If it does not fill the area with a whole number of tiles, the extra space is distributed around the tiles.
style.properties.border-image.values.str: The image is stretched to fill the area.
style.properties.border-inline-color.des: CSS 属性 border-inline-color 定义了元素的逻辑行向的边框颜色，并根据元素的书写模式、行内方向和文本朝向对应至实体边框颜色。根据 writing-mode、direction 和 text-orientation 所定义的值，此属性对应于 border-top-color 和 border-bottom-color，或者 border-right-color 和 border-left-color 属性。
style.properties.border-inline-end-color: CSS 属性 border-inline-end-color 定义了元素的逻辑行末的边框颜色，并根据元素的书写模式、行内方向和文本朝向对应至实体边框颜色。根据 writing-mode、direction 和 text-orientation 所定义的值，此属性对应于 border-top-color、border-right-color、border-bottom-color 或 border-left-color 属性。
style.properties.border-inline-end-style: CSS 属性 border-inline-end-style 定义了元素的逻辑行末的边框线型，并根据元素的书写模式、行内方向和文本朝向对应至实体边框线型。根据 writing-mode、direction 和 text-orientation 所定义的值，此属性对应于 border-top-style、border-right-style、border-bottom-style 或 border-left-style 属性。
style.properties.border-inline-end-width: CSS 属性 border-inline-end-width 定义了元素的逻辑行末的边框宽度，并根据元素的书写模式、行内方向和文本朝向对应至实体边框宽度。根据 writing-mode、direction 和 text-orientation 所定义的值，此属性对应于 border-top-width、border-right-width、border-bottom-width 或 border-left-width 属性。
style.properties.border-inline-end.descr: CSS 属性 border-inline-end 为简写属性，用于在样式表中的某处同时设置逻辑行末边框的各属性值。
style.properties.border-inline-start-col: CSS 属性 border-inline-start-color 定义了元素的逻辑行首的边框颜色，并根据元素的书写模式、行内方向和文本朝向对应至实体边框颜色。根据 writing-mode、direction 和 text-orientation 所定义的值，此属性对应于 border-top-color、border-right-color、border-bottom-color 或 border-left-color 属性。
style.properties.border-inline-start-sty: CSS 属性 border-inline-start-style 定义了元素的逻辑行首的边框线型，并根据元素的书写模式、行内方向和文本朝向对应至实体边框线型。根据 writing-mode、direction 和 text-orientation 所定义的值，此属性对应于 border-top-style、border-right-style、border-bottom-style 或 border-left-style 属性。
style.properties.border-inline-start-wid: CSS 属性 border-inline-start-width 定义了元素的逻辑行首的边框宽度，并根据元素的书写模式、行内方向和文本朝向对应至实体边框宽度。根据 writing-mode、direction 和 text-orientation 所定义的值，此属性对应于 border-top-width、border-right-width、border-bottom-width 或 border-left-width 属性。
style.properties.border-inline-start.des: CSS 属性 border-inline-start 为简写属性，用于在样式表中的某处同时设置逻辑行首边框的各属性值。
style.properties.border-inline-style.des: CSS 属性 border-inline-style 定义了元素的逻辑行向的边框线型，并根据元素的书写模式、行内方向和文本朝向对应至实体边框线型。根据 writing-mode、direction 和 text-orientation 所定义的值，此属性对应于 border-top-style 和 border-bottom-style，或者 border-left-style 和 border-right-style 属性。
style.properties.border-inline-width.des: CSS 属性 border-inline-width 定义了元素的逻辑行向的边框宽度，并根据元素的书写模式、行内方向和文本朝向对应至实体边框宽度。根据 writing-mode、direction 和 text-orientation 所定义的值，此属性对应于 border-top-width 和 border-bottom-width，或者 border-left-width 和 border-right-width 属性。
style.properties.border-inline.descripti: CSS 属性 border-inline 为简写属性，用于在样式表中的某处同时设置逻辑行向边框的各属性值。
style.properties.border-left-color.descr: border-left-color 属性设置元素的左边框颜色。值得注意的是，在大数情况下使用 border-color 或 border-left 更加方便和普遍。
style.properties.border-left-style.descr: The border-left-style CSS property sets the line style of an element's left border.
style.properties.border-left-width.descr: CSS 的 border-left-width 属性用来设置盒子的左边框的宽度。
style.properties.border-left.description: CSS 属性 border-left 是属性border-left-color, border-left-style, 和border-left-width的三者的缩写。这些属性都是在描述一个元素的左边的边框border。
style.properties.border-radius.descripti: CSS 属性 border-radius 允许你设置元素的外边框圆角。当使用一个半径时确定一个圆形，当使用两个半径时确定一个椭圆。这个（椭）圆与边框的交集形成圆角效果。
style.properties.border-right-color.desc: border-right-color CSS 属性用来设置元素右边的 border. 这个属性的值也可以通过简写的 CSS 属性 border-color 或border-right来设置。
style.properties.border-right-style.desc: border-right-style 是 border 中的一个 CSS 子属性，描述的是右边框的样式 border.
style.properties.border-right-width.desc: CSS 的**border-right-width** 用来设置盒子右边框的宽度。
style.properties.border-right.descriptio: CSS 属性 border-right 是属性border-right-color, border-right-style, 和border-right-width的三者的缩写。这些属性都是在描述一个元素的右边的边框border。
style.properties.border-spacing.descript: border-spacing 属性指定相邻单元格边框之间的距离（只适用于 边框分离模式 ）。相当于 HTML 中的 cellspacing 属性，但是第二个可选的值可以用来设置不同于水平间距的垂直间距。
style.properties.border-spacing.values.i: 一个表示父元素的 border-spacing 的计算值的关键字，其父元素必须应用了 border-spacing 。
style.properties.border-start-end-radius: CSS 属性 border-start-end-radius 定义了元素的逻辑边框半径，并根据元素的书写模式、行内方向和文本朝向对应至实体边框半径。此属性便于构建适应各种文本朝向和书写模式的样式。
style.properties.border-start-start-radi: CSS 属性 border-start-start-radius 定义了元素的逻辑边框半径，并根据元素的书写模式、行内方向和文本朝向对应至实体边框半径。此属性便于构建适应各种文本朝向和书写模式的样式。
style.properties.border-style.descriptio: border-style 是一个 CSS 简写属性，用来设定元素所有边框的样式。
style.properties.border-style.values.das: Displays a series of short square-ended dashes or line segments. The exact size and length of the segments are not defined by the specification and are implementation-specific.
style.properties.border-style.values.dot: Displays a series of rounded dots. The spacing of the dots is not defined by the specification and is implementation-specific. The radius of the dots is half the computed value of the same side's border-width.
style.properties.border-style.values.dou: Displays two straight lines that add up to the pixel size defined by border-width.
style.properties.border-style.values.gro: Displays a border with a carved appearance. It is the opposite of ridge.
style.properties.border-style.values.hid: Like the none keyword, displays no border. Unless a background-image is set, the computed value of the same side's border-width will be 0, even if the specified value is something else. In the case of table cell and border collapsing, the hidden value has the highest priority: if any other conflicting border is set, it won't be displayed.
style.properties.border-style.values.ins: Displays a border that makes the element appear embedded. It is the opposite of outset. When applied to a table cell with border-collapse set to collapsed, this value behaves like ridge.
style.properties.border-style.values.non: Like the hidden keyword, displays no border. Unless a background-image is set, the computed value of the same side's border-width will be 0, even if the specified value is something else. In the case of table cell and border collapsing, the none value has the lowest priority: if any other conflicting border is set, it will be displayed.
style.properties.border-style.values.out: Displays a border that makes the element appear embossed. It is the opposite of inset. When applied to a table cell with border-collapse set to collapsed, this value behaves like groove.
style.properties.border-style.values.rid: Displays a border with an extruded appearance. It is the opposite of groove.
style.properties.border-style.values.sol: Displays a single, straight, solid line.
style.properties.border-top-color.descri: border-top-color 属性用以设置某元素顶部 border的颜色。通常，用border-color 或 border-top 设置该颜色更为便捷可取。
border-top-left-radius 用来设置元素左上角的圆角效果。这段圆弧（角）可以是圆或椭圆的一部分。如果其中有一个值为 0，那么将无圆角效果（见 border-top-left-radius 取值方式)。
style.properties.border-top-right-radius: border-top-right-radius 属性设置元素的右上角弧形，这个圆弧可能是一个椭圆，或者其中一个值是 0 的话，就是没有圆弧，换句话就是说拐角是方形的。
style.properties.border-top-style.descri: border-top-style CSS 设置元素上边框的 border.
style.properties.border-top-width.descri: css 属性 border-top-width 是用于设置盒模型的上边框的宽度
style.properties.border-top.description: CSS 属性 border-top是属性 border-top-color, border-top-style, 和border-top-width 的三者的缩写。这些属性都是在描述一个元素的上方的边框border。
style.properties.border-width.descriptio: border-width 属性可以设置盒子模型的边框宽度。
style.properties.border.description: CSS 的 border 属性是一个用于设置各种单独的边界属性的简写属性。border 可以用于设置一个或多个以下属性的值：border-width、border-style、border-color。
style.properties.bottom.description: bottom样式属性定义了定位元素下外边距边界与其包含块下边界之间的偏移，非定位元素设置此属性无效。
style.properties.bottom.values.auto.desc: For non-replaced elements, the effect of this value depends on which of related properties have the value 'auto' as well
style.properties.bottom.values.inherit.d: Specifies that the value is the same as the computed value from its parent element (which might not be its containing block). This computed value is then handled as if it were a <length>, <percentage>, or the auto keyword.
style.properties.box-align.description: The box-align CSS property specifies how an element aligns its contents across its layout in a perpendicular direction. The effect of the property is only visible if there is extra space in the box.
style.properties.box-align.values.baseli: The box aligns the baselines of the contents (lining up the text). This only applies if the box's orientation is horizontal.
style.properties.box-align.values.center: The box aligns contents in the center, dividing any extra space equally between the start and the end.
style.properties.box-align.values.end.de: The box aligns contents at the end, leaving any extra space at the start.
The box aligns contents at the start, leaving any extra space at the end.
style.properties.box-align.values.stretc: The box stretches the contents so that there is no extra space in the box.
style.properties.box-decoration-break.de: box-decoration-break 属性用来定义当元素跨多行、多列或多页时，元素的片段应如何呈现。
style.properties.box-decoration-break.va: 每个框片段与指定的边框、填充和边距独立呈现。border-radius、border-image、box-shadow独立地应用于每个片段，每个片段的背景也是独立绘制的，这意味着使用 background-repeat: no-repeat 的背景图片仍然可能重复多次。
元素被按照盒子被切割前的原始样式渲染，之后，针对每个行/列/页面将此假设框渲染成片段。请注意，假设框对于每个片段可以是不同的，因为如果中断发生在行内方向，则它使用自己的高度，如果中断发生在块方向，则它使用自己的宽度。有关详细信息，请参阅 CSS 规范。
style.properties.box-direction.descripti: The box-direction CSS property specifies whether a box lays out its contents normally (from the top or left edge), or in reverse (from the bottom or right edge).
style.properties.box-direction.values.no: The box lays out its contents from the start (the left or top edge).
style.properties.box-direction.values.re: The box lays out its contents from the end (the right or bottom edge).
style.properties.box-flex-group.descript: The box-flex-group CSS property assigns the flexbox's child elements to a flex group.
style.properties.box-flex.description: The -moz-box-flex and -webkit-box-flex CSS properties specify how a -moz-box or -webkit-box grows to fill the box that contains it, in the direction of the containing box's layout.
style.properties.box-lines.description: The box-lines CSS property determines whether the box may have a single or multiple lines (rows for horizontally oriented boxes, columns for vertically oriented boxes).
style.properties.box-lines.values.multip: Box elements layout in multiple rows or columns.
style.properties.box-lines.values.single: Box elements lay out in a single row or column.
style.properties.box-ordinal-group.descr: The box-ordinal-group CSS property assigns the flexbox's child elements to an ordinal group.
style.properties.box-orient.description: 这是原始的 css 弹性布局草案的一个属性，已经被最新的标准替代。查看 flexbox (en-US) 了解现行标准。
style.properties.box-orient.values.block: 盒子沿块轴展示其子元素。
style.properties.box-orient.values.inlin: 盒子沿内联轴展示其子元素。
style.properties.box-pack.description: The -moz-box-pack and -webkit-box-pack CSS properties specify how a -moz-box or -webkit-box packs its contents in the direction of its layout. The effect of this is only visible if there is extra space in the box.
The box packs contents in the center, dividing any extra space equally between the start and the end.
style.properties.box-pack.values.end.des: The box packs contents at the end, leaving any extra space at the start.
style.properties.box-pack.values.justify: The space is divided evenly in-between each child, with none of the extra space placed before the first child or after the last child. If there is only one child, treat the value as if it were start.
style.properties.box-pack.values.start.d: The box packs contents at the start, leaving any extra space at the end.
style.properties.box-shadow.description: CSS box-shadow 属性用于在元素的框架上添加阴影效果。你可以在同一个元素上设置多个阴影效果，并用逗号将他们分隔开。该属性可设置的值包括阴影的 X 轴偏移量、Y 轴偏移量、模糊半径、扩散半径和颜色。
style.properties.box-shadow.values.inset:
如果没有指定inset，默认阴影在边框外，即阴影向外扩散。
      使用 inset 关键字会使得阴影落在盒子内部，这样看起来就像是内容被压低了。此时阴影会在边框之内 (即使是透明边框）、背景之上、内容之下。
style.properties.box-sizing.description: CSS 中的 box-sizing 属性定义了 user agent 应该如何计算一个元素的总宽度和总高度。
style.properties.box-sizing.values.borde:
width 和 height 属性包括内容，内边距和边框，但不包括外边距。这是当文档处于 Quirks 模式 时 Internet Explorer 使用的盒模型。注意，填充和边框将在盒子内 , 例如， .box {width: 350px; border: 10px solid black;} 导致在浏览器中呈现的宽度为 350px 的盒子。内容框不能为负，并且被分配到 0，使得不可能使用 border-box 使元素消失。
    尺寸计算公式：
    
      width = border + padding + 内容的宽度
      height = border + padding + 内容的高度
style.properties.box-sizing.values.conte:
默认值，标准盒子模型。width 与 height 只包括内容的宽和高，不包括边框（border），内边距（padding），外边距（margin）。注意：内边距、边框和外边距都在这个盒子的外部。比如说，.box {width: 350px; border: 10px solid black;} 在浏览器中的渲染的实际宽度将是 370px。
    尺寸计算公式：
    
      width = 内容的宽度
      height = 内容的高度
    
    宽度和高度的计算值都不包含内容的边框（border）和内边距（padding）。
style.properties.break-after.description: break-after CSS 属性描述在生成的盒子之后的页面，列或区域中断行为（换句话说，如何以及是否中断）。如果没有生成的盒子，则该属性将被忽略。
Forces a page break right after the principal box. Breaking through all possible fragmentation contexts. So a break inside a multicol container, which was inside a page container would force a column and page break.
style.properties.break-after.values.alwa: Forces a page break right after the principal box. The type of this break is that of the immediately-containing fragmentation context. If we are inside a multicol container then it would force a column break, inside paged media (but not inside a multicol container) a page break.
style.properties.break-after.values.auto: Allows, but does not force, any break (page, column, or region) to be inserted right after the principal box.
style.properties.break-after.values.avoi: Avoids any column break right after the principal box.
Avoids any page break right after the principal box.
Avoids any region break right after the principal box.
Avoids any break (page, column, or region) from being inserted right after the principal box.
style.properties.break-after.values.colu: Forces a column break right after the principal box.
style.properties.break-after.values.left: Forces one or two page breaks right after the principal box, whichever will make the next page into a left page.
style.properties.break-after.values.page: Forces a page break right after the principal box.
style.properties.break-after.values.rect: Forces one or two page breaks right after the principal box, whichever will make the next page into a recto page. (A recto page is a right page in a left-to-right spread or a left page in a right-to-left spread.)
style.properties.break-after.values.regi: Forces a region break right after the principal box.
style.properties.break-after.values.righ: Forces one or two page breaks right after the principal box, whichever will make the next page into a right page.
style.properties.break-after.values.vers: Forces one or two page breaks right after the principal box, whichever will make the next page into a verso page. (A verso page is a left page in a left-to-right spread or a left right in a right-to-left spread.)
style.properties.break-before.descriptio: The break-before CSS property sets how page, column, or region breaks should behave before a generated box. If there is no generated box, the property is ignored.
style.properties.break-before.values.all: Forces a page break right after the principal box. Breaking through all possible fragmentation contexts. So a break inside a multicol container, which was inside a page container would force a column and page break.
style.properties.break-before.values.alw: Forces a page break right after the principal box. The type of this break is that of the immediately-containing fragmentation context. If we are inside a multicol container then it would force a column break, inside paged media (but not inside a multicol container) a page break.
style.properties.break-before.values.aut: Allows, but does not force, any break (page, column, or region) to be inserted right before the principal box.
style.properties.break-before.values.avo: Avoids any column break right before the principal box.
Avoids any page break right before the principal box.
Avoids any region break right before the principal box.
Avoids any break (page, column, or region) from being inserted right before the principal box.
style.properties.break-before.values.col: Forces a column break right before the principal box.
style.properties.break-before.values.lef: Forces one or two page breaks right before the principal box, whichever will make the next page into a left page. It's the page placed on the left side of the spine of the book or the back side of the page in duplex printing.
style.properties.break-before.values.pag: Forces a page break right before the principal box.
style.properties.break-before.values.rec: Forces one or two page breaks right before the principal box, whichever will make the next page into a recto page. (A recto page is a right page in a left-to-right spread or a left page in a right-to-left spread.)
style.properties.break-before.values.reg: Forces a region break right before the principal box.
style.properties.break-before.values.rig: Forces one or two page breaks right before the principal box, whichever will make the next page into a right page. It's the page placed on the right side of the spine of the book or the front side of the page in duplex printing.
style.properties.break-before.values.ver: Forces one or two page breaks right before the principal box, whichever will make the next page into a verso page. (A verso page is a left page in a left-to-right spread or a right page in a right-to-left spread.)
style.properties.break-inside.descriptio: break-inside CSS 属性描述了在多列布局页面下的内容盒子如何中断，如果多列布局没有内容盒子，这个属性会被忽略。
style.properties.break-inside.values.aut: 允许 (既不禁止也不强制) 在主框中插入任何中断 (页、列或区域)。
style.properties.break-inside.values.avo: 避免主框中任何列的中断点
避免主框中任何页的中断点
避免原则框内的任何区域中断。
style.properties.caption-side.descriptio: CSS 中 caption-side 属性会将表格的标题（<caption>）放到规定的位置。但是具体显示的位置与表格的 writing-mode 属性值有关。
style.properties.caption-side.values.blo: 标题盒应置于表格的块末一侧。
标题盒应置于表格的块首一侧。
style.properties.caption-side.values.bot: 标题盒应置于表格下方。
style.properties.caption-side.values.inl: 标题盒应置于表格的行末一侧。
标题盒应置于表格的行首一侧。
style.properties.caption-side.values.top: 标题盒应置于表格上方。
style.properties.caret-color.description: caret-color 属性用来定义插入光标（caret）的颜色，这里说的插入光标，就是那个在网页的可编辑器区域内，用来指示用户的输入具体会插入到哪里的那个一闪一闪的形似竖杠 | 的东西。
style.properties.caret-color.values.auto:
默认颜色，此时浏览器应该用 currentcolor 来作为插入光标的颜色，但浏览器可能还会根据当前的背景色、阴影色等来对该颜色进行适当的调整以确保该插入光标具有良好的可见性。
    
      备注： auto 属性值在 CSS transitions/animations 中是不支持颜色插补（interpolated）的
style.properties.caret-shape.description: Specifies the desired shape of the text insertion caret.
style.properties.caret.description: Shorthand for setting caret-color and caret-shape.
style.properties.clear.description: clear CSS 属性指定一个元素是否必须移动 (清除浮动后) 到在它之前的浮动元素下面。clear 属性适用于浮动和非浮动元素。
style.properties.clear.values.both.descr: 元素被向下移动以清除左右浮动。
style.properties.clear.values.inline-end: 元素被向下移动以清除其包含块的结束侧浮动，即 ltr 时清除右浮动，rtl 时清除左浮动。
style.properties.clear.values.inline-sta: 元素被向下移动以清除其包含块的起始侧浮动，即 ltr 时清除左浮动，rtl 时清除右浮动。
style.properties.clear.values.left.descr: 元素被向下移动以清除左浮动。
style.properties.clear.values.none.descr: 元素不会被向下移动以清除浮动。
style.properties.clear.values.right.desc: 元素被向下移动以清除右浮动。
style.properties.clip-path.description: clip-path CSS 属性使用裁剪方式创建元素的可显示区域。区域内的部分显示，区域外的隐藏。
style.properties.clip-path.values.border: 使用 border box 作为引用框。
style.properties.clip-path.values.circle: 定义一个圆形（使用一个半径和一个圆心位置）。
style.properties.clip-path.values.conten: 使用 content box 作为引用框。
style.properties.clip-path.values.ellips: 定义一个椭圆（使用两个半径和一个圆心位置）。
style.properties.clip-path.values.fill-b: 利用对象边界框（object bounding box）作为引用框。
style.properties.clip-path.values.inset(: 定义一个 inset 矩形。
style.properties.clip-path.values.margin: 使用 margin box 作为引用框。
style.properties.clip-path.values.paddin: 使用 padding box 作为引用框。
style.properties.clip-path.values.path(): 定义一个任意形状（使用一个可选的 SVG 填充规则和一个 SVG 路径定义）。
style.properties.clip-path.values.polygo: 定义一个多边形（使用一个 SVG 填充规则和一组顶点）。
style.properties.clip-path.values.stroke: 使用笔触边界框（stroke bounding box）作为引用框。
References a <clipPath> element to create a clipping path.
style.properties.clip-path.values.view-b: 使用最近的 SVG 视口（viewport）作为引用框。如果 viewBox 属性被指定来为元素创建 SVG 视口，引用框将会被定位在坐标系的原点，引用框位于由 viewBox 属性建立的坐标系的原点，引用框的尺寸用来设置 viewBox 属性的宽高值。
style.properties.clip-rule.description: Indicates the algorithm which is to be used to determine what parts of the canvas are included inside the shape.
style.properties.clip-rule.values.evenod: Determines the 'insideness' of a point on the canvas by drawing a ray from that point to infinity in any direction and counting the number of path segments from the given shape that the ray crosses.
style.properties.clip-rule.values.nonzer: Determines the 'insideness' of a point on the canvas by drawing a ray from that point to infinity in any direction and then examining the places where a segment of the shape crosses the ray.
style.properties.clip.description: clip 属性定义了元素的哪一部分是可见的。clip 属性只适用于 position:absolute 的元素。
style.properties.clip.values.rect().desc: Specifies offsets from the edges of the border box.
style.properties.color-interpolation-fil: Specifies the color space for imaging operations performed via filter effects.
Color operations are not required to occur in a particular color space.
Color operations should occur in the linearized RGB color space.
Color operations should occur in the sRGB color space.
style.properties.color-scheme.descriptio: color-scheme CSS 属性允许元素指示它可以舒适地呈现哪些颜色方案。
style.properties.color-scheme.values.dar: 表示可以使用操作系统深色配色方案渲染元素。
style.properties.color-scheme.values.lig: 表示可以使用操作系统亮色配色方案渲染元素。
style.properties.color-scheme.values.nor: 表示元素未指定任何配色方案，因此应使用浏览器的默认配色方案呈现。
style.properties.color-scheme.values.onl:
禁止用户代理覆盖元素的颜色方案。
    可以使用 color-scheme: only light; 应用于特定的元素或 :root，以关闭由 Chrome 的自动深色主题引起的颜色覆盖。
style.properties.color.description: CSS color 属性设置元素的文本以及文本装饰的前景色颜色值，并设置 currentcolor 值。currentcolor 可以用作其他属性的间接值，且为其他颜色属性（如 border-color）的默认值。
style.properties.color.values.currentcol: 将颜色设置为元素的 color 属性值。但是，如果设置为 color 的值，currentcolor 将被视为 inherit。
style.properties.column-count.descriptio: column-count CSS 属性，描述元素的列数。
style.properties.column-count.values.aut: 用来表示列的数量由其他 CSS 属性指定，例如 column-width (en-US).
style.properties.column-fill.description: The column-fill CSS property controls how an element's contents are balanced when broken into columns.
style.properties.column-fill.values.auto: Columns are filled sequentially. Content takes up only the room it needs, possibly resulting in some columns remaining empty.
style.properties.column-fill.values.bala: Content is equally divided between columns. In fragmented contexts, such as paged media, all fragments are balanced.
Content is equally divided between columns. In fragmented contexts, such as paged media, only the last fragment is balanced. Therefore in paged media, only the last page would be balanced.
style.properties.column-gap.description: CSS column-gap 属性用来设置元素列之间的间隔（gutter）大小。
style.properties.column-gap.values.norma: 表示列之间的间隔宽度。在 多列布局 时默认间隔为 1em，其他类型布局默认间隔为 0。
style.properties.column-rule-color.descr: CSS 特性 column-rule-color 让你可以设置在多列布局中被画在两列之间的规则（线条）的颜色。
style.properties.column-rule-style.descr: CSS 特性 column-rule-color 让你可以设置在多列布局中被画在两列之间的规则（线条）的样式。
style.properties.column-rule-width.descr: CSS 特性 column-rule-width 让你可以设置在多列布局中被画在两列之间的规则（线条）的宽度。
style.properties.column-rule.description: CSS column-rule 简写属性可以在多列布局中设定分割线的宽度、样式和颜色。
style.properties.column-span.description: CSS 属性 column-span 的值被设置为 all 时，可以让一个元素跨越所有的列。
元素横跨所有列。元素出现之前，出现在元素之前的正常流中的内容在所有列之间自动平衡。该元素建立一个新的区块格式化上下文。
style.properties.column-width.descriptio: The column-width CSS property sets the ideal column width in a multi-column layout. The container will have as many columns as can fit without any of them having a width less than the column-width value. If the width of the container is narrower than the specified value, the single column's width will be smaller than the declared column width.
style.properties.column-width.values.aut: The width of the column is determined by other CSS properties, such as column-count.
style.properties.columns.description: CSS 属性 columns 用来设置元素的列宽和列数。
style.properties.columns.values.auto.des: The width depends on the values of other properties.
style.properties.contain-intrinsic-block: CSS 逻辑属性 contain-intrinsic-block-size 定义了元素受尺寸局限时浏览器用于布局的元素块向尺寸。
style.properties.contain-intrinsic-heigh: CSS 属性 contain-intrinsic-length 定义了元素受尺寸局限时浏览器用于布局的元素高度。
style.properties.contain-intrinsic-inlin: CSS 逻辑属性 contain-intrinsic-inline-size 定义了元素受尺寸局限时浏览器用于布局的元素行向尺寸。
CSS 简写属性 contain-intrinsic-size 定义了元素受尺寸局限时浏览器用于布局的元素尺寸。

A remembered value of the "normally rendered" element size if one exists and the element is skipping its contents (for example, when it is offscreen); otherwise the specified <length>.
      The none keyword may be used in place of <length> where 0px fixed lengths behave differently than none (such as in multi column, or grid layouts).
元素在所给方向上无固有尺寸。
style.properties.contain-intrinsic-width: CSS 属性 contain-intrinsic-width 定义了元素受尺寸局限时浏览器用于布局的元素宽度。
style.properties.contain.description: CSS 属性 contain 标示了元素及其内容尽可能独立于文档树的其余部分。局限使 DOM 的一部分得以被隔离，且通过将布局、样式、绘制、尺寸或其任意组合的计算限制于 DOM 子树而非整个页面使性能受益。局限也可用于限制 CSS 计数器和引号的作用域。
将除 size 外的所有局限规则应用于元素。此值等价于 contain: layout paint style。
style.properties.contain.values.inline-s: 将行向尺寸局限应用于元素。元素的行向尺寸可无视子元素单独计算。此值不可与 size 结合使用。
style.properties.contain.values.layout.d: 从页面的其余部分中隔离出元素的内部布局。此值意味着元素外的任意内容和元素内部布局互不影响。
style.properties.contain.values.none.des: 元素照常渲染，不应用局限。
style.properties.contain.values.paint.de: 元素后代不在元素边界外显示。若包含盒在屏外，则浏览器无需绘制其被局限的元素——这些元素因为完全局限于此盒故必定也在屏外。若后代元素溢出包含元素的边界，则此后代元素将被裁剪至包含元素的边框盒。
style.properties.contain.values.size.des: 在行向和块向上将尺寸局限应用于元素。元素尺寸可无视子元素单独计算。此值不可与 inline-size 结合使用。
style.properties.contain.values.strict.d: 将所有局限规则应用于元素。此值等价于 contain: size layout paint style。
style.properties.contain.values.style.de: 对于可在元素及其后代外产生影响的属性，其影响将不会逃离包含元素。计数器和引号的作用域被限制为元素及其内容。
style.properties.container-name.descript:
The container-name CSS property specifies a list of query container names used by the @container at-rule in a container query.
  A container query will apply styles to elements based on the size of the nearest ancestor with a containment context.
  When a containment context is given a name, it can be specifically targeted using the @container at-rule instead of the nearest ancestor with containment.
style.properties.container-type.descript: The container-type CSS property is used to define the type of containment used in a container query.
style.properties.container-type.values.i:
Establishes a query container for dimensional queries on the inline axis of the container.
      Applies layout, style, and inline-size containment to the element.
style.properties.container-type.values.n: The element is not a query container for any container size queries, but remains a query container for container style queries.
style.properties.container-type.values.s:
Establishes a query container for container size queries on both the inline and block axis in both the inline and block dimensions.
      Applies layout containment, style containment, and size containment to the container.
style.properties.container.description: The container shorthand CSS property establishes the element as a query container and specifies the name or name for the containment context used in a container query.
style.properties.content-visibility.desc: CSS 属性 content-visibility 控制元素是否渲染其内容，以及施加一组强局限，由此允许用户代理有机会在不需要时省略大片的布局和渲染工作。此属性使用户代理得以在不需要时跳过元素的渲染工作（包括布局和绘制）——由此使页面的初始加载明显变快。
style.properties.content-visibility.valu: 元素启用布局局限、样式局限和绘制局限。若元素不与用户相关，则元素还跳过其内容。与 hidden 不同的是，被跳过的内容必须仍可照常被例如页内查找和 tab 键顺序导航等用户代理特性访问，且必须照常可获得焦点或被选中。
元素跳过其内容。被跳过的内容必须不可被例如页内查找和 tab 键顺序导航等用户代理特性访问，亦不可被选中或获得焦点。此值类似于为内容赋予 display: none。
无效果。元素内容照常进行布局和渲染。
style.properties.content.description: CSS 的 content CSS 属性用于在元素的 ::before 和 ::after 伪元素中插入内容。使用 content 属性插入的内容都是匿名的可替换元素。
style.properties.content.values.attr().d: The attr(n) function returns as a string the value of attribute n for the subject of the selector.
将元素的 X 属性以字符串形式返回。如果该元素没有 X 属性，则返回一个空字符串。区分大小写的属性返回值依赖文挡的语言设定。
The attr(x) CSS function retrieves the value of an attribute of the selected element, or the pseudo-element's originating element. The value of the element's attribute x is an unparsed string representing the attribute name. If there is no attribute x, an empty string is returned. The case sensitivity of the attribute name parameter depends on the document language.
style.properties.content.values.close-qu: 这些值会被 quotes 中定义的字符串替换。
style.properties.content.values.contents: Adds the contents of the element itself to the generated content value.
