style.properties.kerning.values.auto.des: Indicates that the user agent should adjust inter-glyph spacing based on kerning tables that are included in the font that will be used.
style.properties.left.description: CSS **left**属性定义了定位元素的左外边距边界与其包含块左边界之间的偏移，非定位元素设置此属性无效。
style.properties.left.values.auto.descri:
这个关键字表示：
    
      对于绝对定位元素，元素将忽略此属性而以right属性为准，如果此时设置width: auto，将基于内容需要的宽度设置宽度；如果right也为auto的话，元素的水平位置就是它假如作为静态 (即 static) 元素时该在的位置。
      对于相对定位元素，元素相对正常位置的偏移量将基于right属性；如果right也为auto的话，元素将不会有偏移。
style.properties.left.values.inherit.des: 这个关键字表示该值与其父元素 (可能不是它的包含块) 的计算值相同。对这个计算值的处理将和它原本为 <length>， <percentage> 或 auto 一样。
style.properties.letter-spacing.descript: CSS 的 letter-spacing 属性用于设置文本字符的间距表现。在渲染文本时添加到字符之间的自然间距中。letter-spacing 的正值会导致字符分布得更远，而 letter-spacing 的负值会使字符更接近。
style.properties.letter-spacing.values.n: 此间距是按照当前字体的正常间距确定的。和 0 不同的是，normal 会让用户代理调整文字之间空间来对齐文字。
style.properties.lighting-color.descript: Defines the color of the light source for filter primitives 'feDiffuseLighting' and 'feSpecularLighting'.
style.properties.line-break.description: 设置 CSS 属性 line-break 可以用来处理如何断开（break lines）带有标点符号的中文、日文或韩文（CJK）文本的行。
style.properties.line-break.values.anywh:
在每个印刷字符单元（typographic character unit）的周围，都有一个自动换行（soft wrap）的机会，包括任何标点符号（punctuation character）或是保留的空白字符（preserved white spaces），或是单词之间。但忽略任何用于阻止换行的字符，即使是来自 GL、WJ 或 ZWJ 字符集的字符，或是由 word-break 属性强制的字符。不同的换行机会拥有相同的优先级。也不应用断字符（hyphenation，可能是 "-"）。
    英文原文：There is a soft wrap opportunity around every typographic character unit, including around any punctuation character or preserved white spaces, or in the middle of words, disregarding any prohibition against line breaks, even those introduced by characters with the GL, WJ, or ZWJ character class or mandated by the word-break property. The different wrapping opportunities must not be prioritized. Hyphenation is not applied.
使用默认的断行规则分解文本。
style.properties.line-break.values.loose: 使用尽可能松散（least restrictive）的断行规则分解文本。一般用于短行的情况，如报纸。
style.properties.line-break.values.norma: 使用最一般（common）的断行规则分解文本。
style.properties.line-break.values.stric: 使用最严格（stringent）的断行原则分解文本。
style.properties.line-clamp.description: The line-clamp property allows limiting the contents of a block container to the specified number of lines; remaining content is fragmented away and neither rendered nor measured. Optionally, it also allows inserting content into the last line box to indicate the continuity of truncated/interrupted content.
style.properties.line-gap-override.descr: Describes the line-gap metric of a font.
style.properties.line-height-step.descri: The line-height-step CSS property sets the step unit for line box heights. When the property is set, line box heights are rounded up to the closest multiple of the unit.
style.properties.line-height.description: line-height CSS 属性用于设置多行元素的空间量，如多行文本的间距。对于块级元素，它指定元素行盒（line boxes）的最小高度。对于非替代的 inline 元素，它用于计算行盒（line box）的高度。
style.properties.line-height.values.norm: 取决于用户代理。桌面浏览器（包括 Firefox）使用默认值，约为 1.2，这取决于元素的 font-family。
style.properties.list-style-image.descri: list-style-image 属性用来指定一个能用来作为列表元素标记的图片。
style.properties.list-style-image.values: 说明没有图片被用作标记。如果这个值被设定，那么 list-style-type 中定义的值会被取代。
style.properties.list-style-position.des: list-style-position 属性指定标记框在主体块框中的位置。
style.properties.list-style-position.val: 标记盒是主要块盒中的第一个行内盒，处于元素的内容流之后。
标记盒在主块盒的外面。
style.properties.list-style-type.descrip: Used to construct the default contents of a list item's marker
Decimal numbers, padded by initial zeros.
Iroha is the old japanese ordering of syllabs.
Japanese formal numbering to be used in legal or financial document. The kanjis are designed so that they can't be modified to look like another correct one
Iroha is the old japanese ordering of syllabs.
Defines an anonymous style of the list.
style.properties.list-style.description: list-style CSS 属性是一个简写对属性集合，包括list-style-type, list-style-image, 和 list-style-position。
style.properties.list-style.values.insid: The marker box is outside the principal block box, as described in the section on the ::marker pseudo-element below.
style.properties.list-style.values.outsi: The ::marker pseudo-element is an inline element placed immediately before all ::before pseudo-elements in the principal block box, after which the element's content flows.
style.properties.list-style.values.symbo: Allows a counter style to be defined inline.
style.properties.margin-block-end.descri: CSS 属性 margin-block-end 定义了元素的逻辑块末外边距，并根据元素的书写模式、行内方向和文本朝向对应至实体外边距。
style.properties.margin-block-start.desc: CSS 属性 margin-block-start 定义了元素的逻辑块首外边距，并根据元素的书写模式、行内方向和文本朝向对应至实体外边距。
style.properties.margin-block.descriptio: CSS 简写属性 margin-block 定义了元素的逻辑块首和块末外边距，并根据元素的书写模式、行内方向和文本朝向对应至实体外边距。
style.properties.margin-bottom.descripti: Shorthand property to set values for the thickness of the margin area. If left is omitted, it is the same as right. If bottom is omitted it is the same as top, if right is omitted it is the same as top. Negative values for margin properties are allowed, but there may be implementation-specific limits..
style.properties.margin-bottom.values.au: 由浏览器自己选择一个合适的值。参见 margin。
style.properties.margin-inline-end.descr: margin-inline-end CSS 属性定义元素的逻辑行末外边距，根据元素的书写模式、行内方向和文本朝向映射为实体外边距。换句话说，它根据 writing-mode、direction 和 text-orientation 属性的值对应于 margin-top、margin-right、margin-bottom 或 margin-left 属性。
style.properties.margin-inline-start.des: margin-inline-start CSS 属性定义元素的逻辑行首外边距，根据元素的书写模式、行内方向和文本朝向映射为实体的外边距。它根据 writing-mode、direction 和 text-orientation 属性的值对应于 margin-top、margin-right、margin-bottom 或 margin-left 属性。
style.properties.margin-inline.descripti: CSS 简写属性 margin-inline 定义了元素的逻辑行首和行末外边距，并根据元素的书写模式、行内方向和文本朝向对应至实体外边距。
style.properties.margin-left.description: margin-left 属性 设置与元素相关联的盒子模型的左外边距。这个值可以为负值。
style.properties.margin-left.values.auto:
auto 关键词表示在当前布局模式下，浏览器根据接收的左边距自动计算出外边距。如果有几组 margin-left 和 margin-right 设置为 auto，那么最后计算的空间分布，会根据 display，float，position 属性，自动生成以下几种情况：
    
      
        
          Value of display
          Value of float
          Value of position
          Computed value of auto
          Comment
        
      
      
        
          inline, inline-block, inline-table
          any
          static or relative
          0
          Inline layout mode
        
        
          block, inline, inline-block, block, table, inline-table, list-item, table-caption
          any
          static or relative
          0, 除非margin-left和 margin-right 同时都设置为 auto。这样的话，元素就被设置为基于父元素居中。
          Block layout mode
        
        
          block, inline, inline-block, block, table, inline-table, list-item, table-caption
          left or right
          static or relative
          0
          Block layout mode (floating element)
        
        
          any table-*, except table-caption
          any
          any
          0
          Internal table-* elements don't have margins, use border-spacing instead
        
        
          any, except flex, inline-flex, or table-*
          any
          fixed or absolute
          0, except if both margin-left and margin-right are set to auto. In this case, it is set to the value centering the border area inside the available width, if fixed.
          Absolutely positioned layout mode
        
        
          flex, inline-flex
          any
          any
          在水平方向上有空余空间的情况下，空余的空间会被平均分给水平方向上写有 margin-left:auto 属性的元素的外边距
          Flexbox layout mode
style.properties.margin-right.descriptio: margin-right 属性 设置与元素相关联的盒子模型的右外边距。这个值可以为负值。
style.properties.margin-right.values.aut:
auto 关键词表示在当前布局模式下，浏览器根据接收的左边距自动计算出外边距。如果有几组 margin-left 和 margin-right 设置为 auto，那么最后计算的空间分布，会根据 display，float，position 属性，自动生成以下几种情况：
    
      
        
          Value of display
          Value of float
          Value of position
          Computed value of auto
          Comment
        
      
      
        
          inline, inline-block, inline-table
          any
          static or relative
          0
          Inline layout mode
        
        
          block, inline, inline-block, block, table, inline-table, list-item, table-caption
          any
          static or relative
          0, except if both margin-left and margin-right are set to auto. In this case, it is set to the value centering the element inside its parent.
          Block layout mode
        
        
          block, inline, inline-block, block, table, inline-table, list-item, table-caption
          left or right
          static or relative
          0
          Block layout mode (floating element)
        
        
          any table-*, except table-caption
          any
          any
          0
          Internal table-* elements don't have margins, use border-spacing instead
        
        
          any, except flex, inline-flex, or table-*
          any
          fixed or absolute
          0, except if both margin-left and margin-right are set to auto. In this case, it is set to the value centering the border area inside the available width, if fixed.
          Absolutely positioned layout mode
        
        
          flex, inline-flex
          any
          any
          0, except if there is any positive horizontal free space. In this case, it is evenly distributed to all horizontal auto margins.
          Flexbox layout mode
style.properties.margin-top.description: margin-top CSS 属性用于设置元素的顶部外边距外边距区域。正值使它离相邻元素更远，而负值使它更靠近相邻元素。
浏览器选择一个合适的值来使用。参见 margin。
style.properties.margin-trim.description: The margin-trim property allows the container to trim the margins of its children where they adjoin the container's edges.
style.properties.margin-trim.values.bloc: Margin of last block child with the container's edge is trimmed to zero.
Margin of the first block child with the container's edge is trimmed to zero.
Margins provided to the block children where they adjoin the container's edges are trimmed to zero without affecting the margins provided to the container.
style.properties.margin-trim.values.inli: Margin between the container's edge and the last inline child is trimmed to zero.
Margin between the container's edge and the first inline child is trimmed to zero.
Margins provided to the inline children where they adjoin the container's edges are trimmed to zero, without affecting the spacing at the beginning and end of the row.
style.properties.margin-trim.values.none: Margins are not trimmed by the container.
style.properties.margin.description: margin 属性为给定元素设置所有四个（上下左右）方向的外边距属性。也就是 margin-top，margin-right，margin-bottom，和 margin-left 四个外边距属性设置的简写。
style.properties.margin.values.auto.desc: 让浏览器自己选择一个合适的外边距。有时，在一些特殊情况下，该值可以使元素居中。
style.properties.marker-end.description: Specifies the marker that will be drawn at the last vertices of the given markable element.
Indicates that no marker symbol will be drawn at the given vertex or vertices.
style.properties.marker-end.values.url(): Indicates that the <marker> element referenced will be used.
style.properties.marker-mid.description: Specifies the marker that will be drawn at all vertices except the first and last.
Indicates that no marker symbol will be drawn at the given vertex or vertices.
style.properties.marker-mid.values.url(): Indicates that the <marker> element referenced will be used.
style.properties.marker-start.descriptio: Specifies the marker that will be drawn at the first vertices of the given markable element.
style.properties.marker-start.values.non: Indicates that no marker symbol will be drawn at the given vertex or vertices.
style.properties.marker-start.values.url: Indicates that the <marker> element referenced will be used.
style.properties.marker.description: Specifies the marker symbol that shall be used for all points on the sets the value for all vertices on the given 'path' element or basic shape.
style.properties.marker.values.none.desc: Indicates that no marker symbol will be drawn at the given vertex or vertices.
style.properties.marker.values.url().des: Indicates that the <marker> element referenced will be used.
style.properties.marks.description: The marks CSS at-rule descriptor, used with the @page at-rule, adds crop and/or cross marks to the presentation of the document. Crop marks indicate where the page should be cut. Cross marks are used to align sheets.
style.properties.mask-border-mode.descri: 该CSS属性指定使用的混合模式面具边界。mask-border-mode
style.properties.mask-border-mode.values: 掩模边界图像的亮度值用作掩模值。
掩模边界图像的亮度值用作掩模值。
style.properties.mask-border-outset.desc: The mask-border-outset CSS property specifies the distance by which an element's mask border is set out from its border box.
style.properties.mask-border-repeat.desc: mask-border-repeat CSS 属性设置如何调整源图像的边缘区域以适应元素遮罩边框的尺寸。
style.properties.mask-border-repeat.valu: 源图像的边缘区域被平铺（重复）以填充每个边界之间的间隙，可以裁剪平铺图形以达到合适的贴合效果。
源图像的边缘区域被平铺（重复）以填充每个边界之间的间隙，可以拉伸平铺图形以实现适当的贴合。
源图像的边缘区域被平铺（重复）以填充每个边框之间的间隙。平铺图形之间将分配额外的空间，以实现适当的贴合。
拉伸源图像的边缘区域以填充每个边界之间的间隙。
style.properties.mask-border-slice.descr: 的CSS属性除以掩模边界源成区域的图像集合。这些区域用于形成元素的遮罩边框的组成部分。mask-border-slice
style.properties.mask-border-slice.value: Preserves the middle image region. Its width and height are sized to match the top and left image regions, respectively.
style.properties.mask-border-source.desc: The mask-border-source CSS property sets the source image used to create an element's mask border.
style.properties.mask-border-width.descr: mask-border-width CSS 属性设置元素的 mask border的宽度
style.properties.mask-border-width.value: 使mask-border的宽度等于相应mask-border-slice的固有宽度或高度（以适用者为准），如果图像没有所需的固有尺寸，则使用相应的边框宽度。
style.properties.mask-border.description: CSS 属性 mask-border 允许你创建一个紧贴元素边框边缘的 mask。
style.properties.mask-clip.description: The mask-clip CSS property determines the area which is affected by a mask. The painted content of an element must be restricted to this area.
style.properties.mask-clip.values.border: The painted content is clipped to the border box.
This keyword behaves the same as border-box.
style.properties.mask-clip.values.conten: The painted content is clipped to the content box.
This keyword behaves the same as content-box.
style.properties.mask-clip.values.fill-b: The painted content is clipped to the object bounding box.
style.properties.mask-clip.values.no-cli: The painted content is not clipped.
style.properties.mask-clip.values.paddin: The painted content is clipped to the padding box.
This keyword behaves the same as padding-box.
style.properties.mask-clip.values.stroke: The painted content is clipped to the stroke bounding box.
style.properties.mask-clip.values.text.d: This keyword clips the mask image to the text of the element.
style.properties.mask-clip.values.view-b: Uses the nearest SVG viewport as reference box. If a viewBox attribute is specified for the element creating the SVG viewport, the reference box is positioned at the origin of the coordinate system established by the viewBox attribute and the dimension of the reference box is set to the width and height values of the viewBox attribute.
style.properties.mask-composite.descript: The mask-composite CSS property represents a compositing operation used on the current mask layer with the mask layers below it.
style.properties.mask-composite.values.a: The source is placed over the destination.
style.properties.mask-composite.values.e: The non-overlapping regions of source and destination are combined.
style.properties.mask-composite.values.i: The parts of source that overlap the destination, replace the destination.
style.properties.mask-composite.values.s: The source is placed, where it falls outside of the destination.
style.properties.mask-image.description: mask-image CSS 属性设置了用作元素蒙版层的图像。默认情况下，这意味着蒙版图像的 alpha 通道将与元素的 alpha 通道相乘。可以使用 mask-mode 属性对此进行控制。
默认值，透明的黑色图像层，也就是没有遮罩层。
style.properties.mask-image.values.url(): Reference to a <mask element or to a CSS image.
style.properties.mask-mode.description: mask-modeCSS属性指示由mask-image 指向的遮罩被视为亮度或阿尔法遮罩。
此关键字指示应使用掩码层图像的透明度（阿尔法通道）值作为掩码值。
style.properties.mask-mode.values.auto.d: Use alpha values if 'mask-image' is an image, luminance if a <mask> element or a CSS image.
style.properties.mask-mode.values.lumina: 此关键字指示掩膜层图像的亮度值应用作掩码值。
style.properties.mask-mode.values.match-:
如果mask-image属性是<mask-source>类型，掩模层图像的亮度值会被作为掩模值。
    如果它是类型<image>，掩码层图像的 alpha 值应用作掩码值。
style.properties.mask-origin.description: The mask-origin CSS property sets the origin of a mask.
style.properties.mask-origin.values.bord: The position is relative to the border box.
style.properties.mask-origin.values.cont: The position is relative to the content box.
style.properties.mask-origin.values.fill: The position is relative to the object bounding box.
style.properties.mask-origin.values.padd: The position is relative to the padding box. For single boxes 0 0 is the upper left corner of the padding edge, 100% 100% is the lower right corner.
style.properties.mask-origin.values.stro: The position is relative to the stroke bounding box.
style.properties.mask-origin.values.view: Uses the nearest SVG viewport as reference box. If a viewBox attribute is specified for the element creating the SVG viewport, the reference box is positioned at the origin of the coordinate system established by the viewBox attribute and the dimension of the reference box is set to the width and height values of the viewBox attribute.
style.properties.mask-position.descripti: The mask-position CSS property sets the initial position, relative to the mask position layer set by mask-origin, for each defined mask image.
style.properties.mask-repeat.description: CSS 的 mask-repeat 属性定义了遮罩图片是否重复显示多个副本，以及如何重复。一个遮罩图片可以水平重复、垂直重复或双向重复，也可以不重复。
style.properties.mask-size.description: The mask-size CSS property specifies the sizes of the mask images. The size of the image can be fully or partially constrained in order to preserve its intrinsic ratio.
style.properties.mask-size.values.auto a: If the image has both intrinsic dimensions, it is rendered at that size. If it has no intrinsic dimensions and no intrinsic proportion, it is rendered at the size of the mask positioning area. If it has no dimensions but has a proportion, it's rendered as if contain had been specified instead. If the image has one intrinsic dimension and a proportion, it's rendered at the size determined by that one dimension and the proportion. If the image has one intrinsic dimension but no proportion, it's rendered using the intrinsic dimension and the corresponding dimension of the mask positioning area.
style.properties.mask-size.values.auto.d: If the image has an intrinsic proportion, then render it using the specified dimension and compute the other dimension from the specified dimension and the intrinsic proportion. If the image has no intrinsic proportion, use the specified dimension for that dimension. For the other dimension, use the image's corresponding intrinsic dimension if there is one. If there is no such intrinsic dimension, use the corresponding dimension of the mask positioning area.
style.properties.mask-size.values.contai: The image is rendered by preserving its intrinsic proportion at the largest size contained within or covering the mask positioning area. If the image has no intrinsic proportion, then it is rendered at the size of the mask positioning area.
The image is rendered by preserving its intrinsic proportion at the largest size contained within or covering the mask positioning area. If the image has no intrinsic proportion, then it is rendered at the size of the mask positioning area.
style.properties.mask-size.values.mask-s: If the image has an intrinsic proportion, then render it using the specified dimension and compute the other dimension from the specified dimension and the intrinsic proportion. If the image has no intrinsic proportion, use the specified dimension for that dimension. For the other dimension, use the image's corresponding intrinsic dimension if there is one. If there is no such intrinsic dimension, use the corresponding dimension of the mask positioning area.
style.properties.mask-type.description: The mask-type CSS property sets whether an SVG <mask> element is used as a luminance or an alpha mask. It applies to the <mask> element itself.
Is a keyword indicating that the associated mask image is an alpha mask, i.e., that its alpha channel values must be used when applying it.
style.properties.mask-type.values.lumina: Is a keyword indicating that the associated mask image is a luminance mask, i.e., that its relative luminance values must be used when applying it.
style.properties.mask.description: CSS 属性 mask 允许使用者通过遮罩或者裁切特定区域的图片的方式来隐藏一个元素的部分或者全部可见区域。
style.properties.masonry-auto-flow.descr: The masonry-auto-flow CSS property modifies how items are placed when using masonry in CSS Grid Layout.
style.properties.masonry-auto-flow.value: Display as in the default masonry algorithm, placing items with a definite place first before placing other masonry items.
Items will be placed one after the other in the grid axis.
Ignore any items with a definite placement, and place everything according to order-modified document order.
As per the default masonry algorithm, items will be placed into the track with the most room.
style.properties.math-depth.description: The math-depth property describes a notion of depth for each element of a mathematical formula, with respect to the top-level container of that formula. This is used to scale the computed value of the font-size of elements when font-size: math is applied.
style.properties.math-depth.values.add(<: Set to the inherited math-depth plus the specified integer.
style.properties.math-depth.values.auto-: Set to the inherited math-depth plus 1 when inherited math-style is compact.
style.properties.math-shift.description: The math-shift property indicates whether superscripts inside MathML formulas should be raised by a normal or compact shift.
style.properties.math-shift.values.compa: Indicates compact rendering. Superscripts in MathML formulas use the superscriptShiftUpCramped parameter from the OpenType MATH table, which is generally smaller.
style.properties.math-shift.values.norma: The initial value, indicates normal rendering. Superscripts in MathML formulas use the superscriptShiftUp parameter from the OpenType MATH table.
style.properties.math-style.description: The math-style property indicates whether MathML equations should render with normal or compact height.
style.properties.math-style.values.compa: The math layout on descendants tries to minimize the logical height.
style.properties.math-style.values.norma: The initial value, indicates normal rendering.
style.properties.max-block-size.descript: The max-block-size CSS property specifies the maximum size of an element in the direction opposite that of the writing direction as specified by writing-mode. That is, if the writing direction is horizontal, then max-block-size is equivalent to max-height; if the writing direction is vertical, max-block-size is the same as max-width.
style.properties.max-block-size.values.f: Uses the fit-content formula with the available space replaced by the specified argument, i.e. min(max-content, max(min-content, argument)).
style.properties.max-block-size.values.n: No limit on the size of the box.
style.properties.max-height.description: CSS属性 max-height 设置元素的最大高度。它防止height属性的使用值（used value）大于 max-height 的指定值。
The browser will calculate and select a max-height for the specified element.
style.properties.max-height.values.fit-c: Uses the fit-content formula with the available space replaced by the specified argument, i.e. min(max-content, max(min-content, argument)).
Use the fit-content inline size or fit-content block size, as appropriate to the writing mode.
No limit on the size of the box.
style.properties.max-inline-size.descrip: CSS 属性 max-inline-size 根据元素的书写模式定义了元素区块的横向或纵向最大尺寸。根据 writing-mode 的值，此属性对应于 max-width 或 max-height 属性。
No limit on the height of the box.
style.properties.max-lines.description: The max-lines property forces a break after a set number of lines
style.properties.max-width.description: max-width 属性用来给元素设置最大宽度值。定义了 max-width 的元素会在达到 max-width 值之后避免进一步按照 width 属性设置变大。
style.properties.max-width.values.fill-a: The containing block width minus horizontal margin, border, and padding. Some browsers implement an ancient name for this keyword, available.
style.properties.max-width.values.fit-co: Uses the fit-content formula with the available space replaced by the specified argument, i.e. min(max-content, max(min-content, argument)).
style.properties.max-zoom.description:
The max-zoom CSS descriptor sets the maximum zoom factor of a document defined by the @viewport at-rule. The browser will not zoom in any further than this, whether automatically or at the user's request.

A zoom factor of 1.0 or 100% corresponds to no zooming. Larger values are zoomed in. Smaller values are zoomed out.
style.properties.min-block-size.descript: CSS 属性 min-block-size 根据元素的书写模式定义了元素区块的横向或纵向最小尺寸。根据 writing-mode 的值，此属性对应于 min-width 或 min-height 属性。
style.properties.min-height.description: CSS 属性 min-height 能够设置元素的最小高度。这样能够防止 height 属性的应用值小于 min-height 的值。
浏览器将通过计算为指定元素选择一个 min-height 值。
style.properties.min-height.values.fit-c: Uses the fit-content formula with the available space replaced by the specified argument, i.e. min(max-content, max(min-content, argument)).
Use the fit-content inline size or fit-content block size, as appropriate to the writing mode.
style.properties.min-inline-size.descrip: CSS 属性 min-inline-size 根据元素的书写模式定义了元素区块的横向或纵向最小尺寸。根据 writing-mode 的值，此属性对应于 min-width 或 min-height 属性。
style.properties.min-width.description: min-width 属性为给定元素设置最小宽度。它可以阻止 width 属性的应用值小于 min-width 的值。
style.properties.min-width.values.auto.d: 用于弹性元素的默认最小宽度。相比其他布局中以0为默认值，auto能为弹性布局指明更合理的默认表现。
style.properties.min-width.values.fill-a: 包含块的宽度减去水平 margin、border 和 padding。有些浏览器在实现时使用了该关键字的早期名字： available。
style.properties.min-width.values.fit-co: Uses the fit-content formula with the available space replaced by the specified argument, i.e. min(max-content, max(min-content, argument)).
style.properties.min-zoom.description:
The min-zoom CSS descriptor sets the minimum zoom factor of a document defined by the @viewport at-rule. The browser will not zoom out any further than this, whether automatically or at the user's request.

A zoom factor of 1.0 or 100% corresponds to no zooming. Larger values are zoomed in. Smaller values are zoomed out.
style.properties.mix-blend-mode.descript: mix-blend-mode CSS 属性描述了元素的内容应该与元素的直系父元素的内容和元素的背景如何混合。
style.properties.mix-blend-mode.values.c: Darkens the backdrop color to reflect the source color.
Brightens the backdrop color to reflect the source color.
Creates a color with the hue and saturation of the source color and the luminosity of the backdrop color.
style.properties.mix-blend-mode.values.d: Selects the darker of the backdrop and source colors.
Subtracts the darker of the two constituent colors from the lighter color..
style.properties.mix-blend-mode.values.e: Produces an effect similar to that of the Difference mode but lower in contrast.
style.properties.mix-blend-mode.values.h: Multiplies or screens the colors, depending on the source color value.
Creates a color with the hue of the source color and the saturation and luminosity of the backdrop color.
style.properties.mix-blend-mode.values.l: Selects the lighter of the backdrop and source colors.
Creates a color with the luminosity of the source color and the hue and saturation of the backdrop color.
style.properties.mix-blend-mode.values.m: The source color is multiplied by the destination color and replaces the destination.
style.properties.mix-blend-mode.values.n: Default attribute which specifies no blending
style.properties.mix-blend-mode.values.o: Multiplies or screens the colors, depending on the backdrop color value.
style.properties.mix-blend-mode.values.s: Creates a color with the saturation of the source color and the hue and luminosity of the backdrop color.
Multiplies the complements of the backdrop and source color values, then complements the result.
Darkens or lightens the colors, depending on the source color value.
style.properties.motion-offset.descripti: A distance that describes the position along the specified motion path.
style.properties.motion-path.description: Specifies the motion path the element gets positioned at.
style.properties.motion-path.values.path: Defines an SVG path as a string, with optional 'fill-rule' as the first argument.
style.properties.motion-rotation.descrip: Defines the direction of the element while positioning along the motion path.
Indicates that the object is rotated by the angle of the direction of the motion path.
Indicates that the object is rotated by the angle of the direction of the motion path plus 180 degrees.
style.properties.motion.values.auto.desc: Indicates that the object is rotated by the angle of the direction of the motion path.
style.properties.motion.values.path().de: Defines an SVG path as a string, with optional 'fill-rule' as the first argument.
style.properties.motion.values.reverse.d: Indicates that the object is rotated by the angle of the direction of the motion path plus 180 degrees.
style.properties.nav-down.description: Provides an way to control directional focus navigation.
style.properties.nav-down.values.auto.de: The user agent automatically determines which element to navigate the focus to in response to directional navigational input.
style.properties.nav-down.values.current: Indicates that the user agent should target the frame that the element is in.
style.properties.nav-down.values.root.de: Indicates that the user agent should target the full window.
style.properties.nav-index.description: Provides an input-method-neutral way of specifying the sequential navigation order (also known as 'tabbing order').
style.properties.nav-index.values.auto.d: The element's sequential navigation order is assigned automatically by the user agent.
style.properties.nav-left.description: Provides an way to control directional focus navigation.
style.properties.nav-left.values.auto.de: The user agent automatically determines which element to navigate the focus to in response to directional navigational input.
style.properties.nav-left.values.current: Indicates that the user agent should target the frame that the element is in.
style.properties.nav-left.values.root.de: Indicates that the user agent should target the full window.
style.properties.nav-right.description: Provides an way to control directional focus navigation.
style.properties.nav-right.values.auto.d: The user agent automatically determines which element to navigate the focus to in response to directional navigational input.
style.properties.nav-right.values.curren: Indicates that the user agent should target the frame that the element is in.
style.properties.nav-right.values.root.d: Indicates that the user agent should target the full window.
style.properties.nav-up.description: Provides an way to control directional focus navigation.
style.properties.nav-up.values.auto.desc: The user agent automatically determines which element to navigate the focus to in response to directional navigational input.
style.properties.nav-up.values.current.d: Indicates that the user agent should target the frame that the element is in.
style.properties.nav-up.values.root.desc: Indicates that the user agent should target the full window.
style.properties.negative.description: @counter-style descriptor. Defines how to alter the representation when the counter value is negative.
style.properties.object-fit.description: object-fit CSS 属性指定可替换元素（例如： 或
style.properties.object-fit.values.conta: 被替换的内容将被缩放，以在填充元素的内容框时保持其宽高比。整个对象在填充盒子的同时保留其长宽比，因此如果宽高比与框的宽高比不匹配，该对象将被添加“黑边”。
style.properties.object-fit.values.cover: 被替换的内容在保持其宽高比的同时填充元素的整个内容框。如果对象的宽高比与内容框不相匹配，该对象将被剪裁以适应内容框。
被替换的内容正好填充元素的内容框。整个对象将完全填充此框。如果对象的宽高比与内容框不相匹配，那么该对象将被拉伸以适应内容框。
被替换的内容将保持其原有的尺寸。
style.properties.object-fit.values.scale: 内容的尺寸与 none 或 contain 中的一个相同，取决于它们两个之间谁得到的对象尺寸会更小一些。
style.properties.object-position.descrip: CSS 属性 object-position 规定了可替换元素的内容，在这里我们称其为对象（即 object-position 中的 object）在其内容框中的位置。可替换元素的内容框中未被对象所覆盖的部分，则会显示该元素的背景。
style.properties.offset-anchor.descripti: The offset-anchor CSS property specifies the point inside the box of an element traveling along an offset-path that is actually moving along the path.
style.properties.offset-anchor.values.au: offset-anchor is given the same value as the element's transform-origin, unless offset-path is none, in which case it takes its value from offset-position.
style.properties.offset-block-end.descri: Logical 'bottom'. Mapping depends on the parent element's 'writing-mode', 'direction', and 'text-orientation'.
style.properties.offset-block-end.values: For non-replaced elements, the effect of this value depends on which of related properties have the value 'auto' as well.
style.properties.offset-block-start.desc: Logical 'top'. Mapping depends on the parent element's 'writing-mode', 'direction', and 'text-orientation'.
style.properties.offset-block-start.valu: For non-replaced elements, the effect of this value depends on which of related properties have the value 'auto' as well.
style.properties.offset-distance.descrip: The offset-distance CSS property specifies a position along an offset-path for an element to be placed.
style.properties.offset-inline-end.descr: Logical 'right'. Mapping depends on the parent element's 'writing-mode', 'direction', and 'text-orientation'.
style.properties.offset-inline-end.value: For non-replaced elements, the effect of this value depends on which of related properties have the value 'auto' as well.
style.properties.offset-inline-start.des: Logical 'left'. Mapping depends on the parent element's 'writing-mode', 'direction', and 'text-orientation'.
style.properties.offset-inline-start.val: For non-replaced elements, the effect of this value depends on which of related properties have the value 'auto' as well.
style.properties.offset-path.description: The offset-path CSS property specifies a path for an element to follow and determines the element's positioning within the path's parent container or the SVG coordinate system. The path is a line, a curve, or a geometrical shape along which the element gets positioned or moves.
style.properties.offset-path.values.none: Specifies that the element does not follow any offset path. The none value is equivalent to the element not having any offset transform. The element's movement in this case is determined by its default position properties, such as top and left, instead of an offset path. This is the default value.
style.properties.offset-path.values.ray(: Defines a line starting at a set position, of a set length, and extending at the specified angle. The ray() function accepts up to four parameters – an <angle>, an optional size value, the optional keyword contain, and an optional at <position>.
style.properties.offset-position.descrip: The offset-position CSS property defines the initial position of an element along a path. This property is typically used in combination with the offset-path property to create a motion effect. The value of offset-position determines where the element gets placed initially for moving along an offset-path if the offset-path function does not specify its own starting position.
Indicates that the offset starting position is the top-left corner of the element's box. This is the default value.
Indicates that the element does not have an offset starting position and places the element at (50%, 50%) of the containing block
style.properties.offset-rotate.descripti: The offset-rotate CSS property defines the orientation/direction of the element as it is positioned along the offset-path.
style.properties.offset.description: offset CSS 简写属性设置了沿定义的路径为元素设置动画所需的所有属性。
style.properties.opacity.description: opacity 属性指定了一个元素的不透明度。换言之，opacity 属性指定了一个元素后面的背景的被覆盖程度。
style.properties.order.description: CSS order 属性规定了弹性容器中的可伸缩项目在布局时的顺序。元素按照 order 属性的值的增序进行布局。拥有相同 order 属性值的元素按照它们在源代码中出现的顺序进行布局。
style.properties.orientation.description: The orientation CSS @media media feature can be used to apply styles based on the orientation of the viewport (or the page box, for paged media).
style.properties.orphans.description: The orphans CSS property sets the minimum number of lines in a block container that must be shown at the bottom of a page, region, or column.
style.properties.outline-color.descripti: outline-color CSS 属性 被用于设置一个元素轮廓的颜色。
style.properties.outline-color.values.in: 反色，用于确认轮廓的显示。注意不是所有浏览器都支持该属性，若不则该属性无效。
style.properties.outline-offset.descript: outline-offset CSS 属性用于设置 outline 与一个元素边缘或边框之间的间隙。
style.properties.outline-style.descripti: outline-style CSS 属性被用于设置一个元素轮廓的样式。
style.properties.outline-style.values.au: Permits the user agent to render a custom outline style, typically the default platform style.
style.properties.outline-style.values.da: The outline is a series of short line segments.
style.properties.outline-style.values.do: The outline is a series of dots.
The outline is two single lines. The outline-width is the sum of the two lines and the space between them.
style.properties.outline-style.values.gr: The outline looks as though it were carved into the page.
style.properties.outline-style.values.in: The outline makes the box look as though it were embedded in the page.
style.properties.outline-style.values.no: No outline is used. The outline-width is 0.
style.properties.outline-style.values.ou: The opposite of inset: the outline makes the box look as though it were coming out of the page.
style.properties.outline-style.values.ri: The opposite of groove: the outline looks as though it were extruded from the page.
style.properties.outline-style.values.so: The outline is a single line.
style.properties.outline-width.descripti: CSS 属性 outline-width 用于设置一个元素的轮廓的厚度。元素轮廓是绘制于元素周围的一条线，位于 border 的外围。
style.properties.outline-width.values.me: 取决于用户代理。通常等同于桌面浏览器的 3px （包括 Firefox）。
style.properties.outline-width.values.th: 取决于用户代理。通常等同于桌面浏览器的 5px（包括 Firefox）。
取决于用户代理。通常等同于桌面浏览器的 1px （包括 Firefox）。
style.properties.outline.description: CSS 的 outline 属性是在一条声明中设置多个轮廓属性的简写属性 ，例如 outline-style, outline-width 和 outline-color。
style.properties.outline.values.auto.des: Permits the user agent to render a custom outline style, typically the default platform style.
style.properties.outline.values.invert.d: Performs a color inversion on the pixels on the screen.
style.properties.overflow-anchor.descrip: overflow-anchor CSS 属性提供一种退出浏览器滚动锚定行为的方法，该行为会调整滚动位置以最大程度地减少内容偏移。
The element becomes a potential anchor when adjusting scroll position.
The element won't be selected as a potential anchor.
style.properties.overflow-block.descript: CSS 属性 overflow-block 设置了当内容溢出盒的块首和块末侧时所显示的内容。可以不显示，或者显示滚动条或溢出内容。
style.properties.overflow-block.values.a: 取决于用户代理。若内边距盒可以容纳内容，则与 visible 表现相同，但仍建立新的块格式化上下文。若内容溢出则桌面浏览器提供滚动条。
style.properties.overflow-block.values.h: 若内边距盒在块向尺度上无法容纳内容则裁剪内容。不提供滚动条。
style.properties.overflow-block.values.s: 若内边距盒在块向尺度上无法容纳内容则裁剪内容。无论内容是否被裁剪，浏览器均显示滚动条。（由此可阻止滚动条在内容变化时显示或消失。）打印机仍可能打印溢出内容。
style.properties.overflow-block.values.v: 不裁剪内容且可在内边距盒的块首和块末侧外渲染内容。
style.properties.overflow-clip-box.descr: The overflow-clip-box CSS property specifies relative to which box the clipping happens when there is an overflow. It is short hand for the overflow-clip-box-inline and overflow-clip-box-block properties.
style.properties.overflow-clip-margin.de: The overflow-clip-margin CSS property determines how far outside its bounds an element with overflow: clip may be painted before being clipped. The bound defined by this property is called the overflow clip edge of the box.
style.properties.overflow-inline.descrip: CSS 属性 overflow-inline 设置了当内容溢出盒的行首和行末侧时所显示的内容。可以不显示，或者显示滚动条或溢出内容。
取决于用户代理。若内边距盒可以容纳内容，则与 visible 表现相同，但仍建立新的块格式化上下文。若内容溢出则桌面浏览器提供滚动条。
若内边距盒在行向尺度上无法容纳内容则裁剪内容。不提供滚动条。
若内边距盒在行向尺度上无法容纳内容则裁剪内容。无论内容是否被裁剪，浏览器均显示滚动条。（由此可阻止滚动条在内容变化时显示或消失。）打印机仍可能打印溢出内容。
不裁剪内容且可在内边距盒的行首和行末侧外渲染内容。
style.properties.overflow-wrap.descripti: CSS 属性 overflow-wrap 应用于行级元素，用来设置浏览器是否应该在一个本来不能断开的字符串中插入换行符，以防止文本溢出其行向盒。
style.properties.overflow-wrap.values.an: 为防止溢出，如果行中没有其他可接受的断点，则不可断的字符串（如长词或 URL）可能会在任何时候换行。在断点处不会插入连字符。在计算最小内容内在大小时，会考虑由单词换行引入的软换行机会。
style.properties.overflow-wrap.values.br: 与 anywhere 值相同，如果行中没有其他可接受的断点，则允许在任意点将通常不可断的单词换行，但在计算最小内容内在大小时不考虑断字引入的软换行机会。
style.properties.overflow-wrap.values.no: 行只能在正常的单词断点（例如两个单词之间的空格）处换行。
style.properties.overflow-x.description: CSS 属性 overflow-x 设置了当内容溢出块级元素的左右两侧时所显示的内容。可以不显示，或者显示滚动条或溢出内容。
取决于浏览器本身。当内容发生溢出时，桌面浏览器如 Firefox 会显示滚动条。
Overflow content is clipped at the element's overflow clip edge that is defined using the overflow-clip-margin property. As a result, content overflows the element's padding box by the <length> value of overflow-clip-margin or by 0px if not set. The difference between clip and hidden is that the clip keyword also forbids all scrolling, including programmatic scrolling. No new formatting context is created. To establish a formatting context, use overflow: clip along with display: flow-root. The element box is not a scroll container.
style.properties.overflow-x.values.hidde: 内容会被截断，且不会显示滚动条。
style.properties.overflow-x.values.scrol: 桌面浏览器总是显示滚动条，无论内容是否发生溢出。这可以避免滚动条的显示与消失所导致的元素尺寸不确定的问题。而打印机可能会打印溢出的内容。
style.properties.overflow-x.values.visib: 内容不会被截断，且可以显示在内容盒之外。当 overflow-y 的值为 hidden、scroll 或者 auto，而本属性的值为 visible 时，本属性会被隐式的计算为 auto。
style.properties.overflow-y.description: CSS 属性 overflow-y 设置了当内容溢出块级元素的上下两侧时所显示的内容。可以不显示，或者显示滚动条或溢出内容。
取决于浏览器本身。当内容发生溢出时，桌面浏览器如 Firefox 会显示滚动条。
像 hidden 一样，内容被剪切到元素的填充框中。 clip 和 hidden 的区别是 clip 还禁止所有滚动，包括程序性滚动（programmatic scrolling）。包含框不再是滚动容器，并且不会启动新的格式设置上下文。如果要启动新的格式设置上下文，可以使用 display: flow-root 。
style.properties.overflow-y.values.hidde: 内容会被截断，且不会显示滚动条。
style.properties.overflow-y.values.scrol: 桌面浏览器总是显示滚动条，无论内容是否发生溢出。这可以避免滚动条的显示与消失所导致的元素尺寸不确定的问题。而打印机可能会打印溢出的内容。
style.properties.overflow-y.values.visib: 内容不会被截断，且可以显示在内容盒之外。
style.properties.overflow.description: overflow 是 CSS 的简写属性，其设置了元素溢出时所需的行为——即当元素的内容太大而无法适应它的块级格式化上下文时。
style.properties.overflow.values.-moz-hi: 请使用 overflow: clip 代替。
style.properties.overflow.values.-moz-sc: 请使用 overflow-x: scroll 和 overflow-y: hidden，或使用 overflow: scroll hidden 代替。
请使用 overflow: hidden 代替。
请使用 overflow-x: hidden 和 overflow-y: scroll，或使用 overflow: hidden scroll 代替。
style.properties.overflow.values.auto.de: 取决于用户代理。如果内容适应边距（padding）盒，它看起来与 visible 相同，但是仍然建立了一个新的块级格式化上下文。如果内容溢出，则浏览器提供滚动条。
style.properties.overflow.values.clip.de: 类似于 hidden，内容将以元素的边距（padding）盒进行裁剪。clip 和 hidden 之间的区别是 clip 关键字禁止所有滚动，包括以编程方式的滚动。该盒子不是一个滚动的容器，并且不会启动新的格式化上下文。如果你希望开启一个新的格式化上下文，你可以使用 display: flow-root 来这样做。
如果需要，内容将被裁减以适应边距（padding）盒。不提供滚动条，也不支持允许用户滚动（例如通过拖拽或者使用滚轮）。内容可以以编程的方式滚动（例如，通过设置 scrollLeft 等属性的值或 scrollTo() 方法）, 因此该元素仍然是一个滚动的容器。
style.properties.overflow.values.overlay: 行为与 auto 相同，但是滚动条绘制在内容之上，而不是占据空间。
如果需要，内容将被裁减以适应边距（padding）盒。无论是否实际裁剪了任何内容，浏览器总是显示滚动条，以防止滚动条在内容改变时出现或者消失。打印机可能会打印溢出的内容。
style.properties.overflow.values.visible: 内容不能被裁减并且可能渲染到边距盒（padding）的外部。
style.properties.override-colors.descrip: The override-colors CSS descriptor is used to override colors in the chosen base-palette for a color font.
style.properties.overscroll-behavior-blo: The overscroll-behavior-block CSS property sets the browser's behavior when the block direction boundary of a scrolling area is reached.
The default scroll overflow behavior occurs as normal.

Default scroll overflow behavior (e.g., "bounce" effects) is observed inside the element where this value is set. However, no scroll chaining occurs on neighboring scrolling areas; the underlying elements will not scroll. The contain value disables native browser navigation, including the vertical pull-to-refresh gesture and horizontal swipe navigation.
No scroll chaining occurs to neighboring scrolling areas, and default scroll overflow behavior is prevented.
style.properties.overscroll-behavior-inl: The overscroll-behavior-inline CSS property sets the browser's behavior when the inline direction boundary of a scrolling area is reached.
The default scroll overflow behavior occurs as normal.

Default scroll overflow behavior (e.g., "bounce" effects) is observed inside the element where this value is set. However, no scroll chaining occurs on neighboring scrolling areas; the underlying elements will not scroll. The contain value disables native browser navigation, including the vertical pull-to-refresh gesture and horizontal swipe navigation.
No scroll chaining occurs to neighboring scrolling areas, and default scroll overflow behavior is prevented.
style.properties.overscroll-behavior-x.d: overscroll-behavior-x 这个 CSS 属性用来控制当滚动到区域的水平边界时的浏览器行为。
style.properties.overscroll-behavior-x.v: 默认的滚动溢出行为表现的和正常一样。
默认的滚动溢出行为将被内部的元素观察到，(例如：“bounce”效果或者刷新)，但是相邻的区域不会产生连续滚动效果，例如：在下面的元素不会被滚动。
相邻的滚动区域不会有连续滚动效果，并且默认的滚动溢出行为会被阻止。
style.properties.overscroll-behavior-y.d: overscroll-behavior-y CSS 属性设置浏览器在到达滚动区域的垂直边界时的行为。
style.properties.overscroll-behavior-y.v: 默认情况下，滚动溢出行为正常发生。
在设置了该值的元素内部会观察到默认滚动溢出行为（例如“回弹”效果或刷新），但相邻滚动区域不会发生滚动行为，例如底部元素不会滚动。
相邻滚动区域不会发生滚动行为，并防止默认滚动溢出行为。
style.properties.overscroll-behavior.des: overscroll-behavior CSS 属性是 overscroll-behavior-x 和 overscroll-behavior-y 属性的合并写法，让你可以控制浏览器过度滚动时的表现——也就是滚动到边界。
style.properties.overscroll-behavior.val: 设置这个值后，默认的滚动边界行为不变（“触底”效果或者刷新），但是临近的滚动区域不会被滚动链影响到，比如对话框后方的页面不会滚动。
临近滚动区域不受到滚动链影响，而且默认的滚动到边界的表现也被阻止。
style.properties.pad.description: @counter-style descriptor. Specifies a "fixed-width" counter style, where representations shorter than the pad value are padded with a particular <symbol>
style.properties.padding-block-end.descr: CSS 属性 padding-block-end 定义了元素的逻辑块末内边距，并根据元素的书写模式、行内方向和文本朝向对应至实体内边距。
style.properties.padding-block-start.des: CSS 属性 padding-block-start 定义了元素的逻辑块首内边距，并根据元素的书写模式、行内方向和文本朝向对应至实体内边距。
style.properties.padding-block.descripti: CSS 简写属性 padding-block 定义了元素的逻辑块首和块末内边距，并根据元素的书写模式、行内方向和文本朝向对应至实体内边距。
style.properties.padding-bottom.descript: CSS 属性 padding-bottom 是指一个元素在内边距区域（padding area）中下方的高度。内边距（padding）是指一个元素的内容和边框之间的区域。和外边距（margin）不同，内边距（padding）是不允许有负值的。内边距（padding）可以用四个值声明一个元素的四个方向的内边距（paddings），这是一种 CSS 缩写属性。
style.properties.padding-inline-end.desc: CSS 属性 padding-inline-end 定义了元素的逻辑行末内边距，并根据元素的书写模式、行内方向和文本朝向对应至实体内边距。
style.properties.padding-inline-start.de: CSS 属性 padding-inline-start 定义了元素的逻辑行首内边距，并根据元素的书写模式、行内方向和文本朝向对应至实体内边距。
style.properties.padding-inline.descript: CSS 简写属性 padding-inline 定义了元素的逻辑行首和行末内边距，并根据元素的书写模式、行内方向和文本朝向对应至实体内边距。
style.properties.padding-left.descriptio: CSS 属性 padding-left 是指一个元素在内边距区域（padding area）中左边的宽度。内边距（padding）是指一个元素的内容和边框之间的区域。
style.properties.padding-right.descripti: CSS 属性 padding-right 是指一个元素在内边距区域（padding area）中右边的宽度。内边距（padding）是指一个元素的内容和边框之间的区域。和外边距（margin）不同，内边距（padding）是不允许有负值的。内边距（padding）可以用四个值声明一个元素的四个方向的内边距（paddings），这是一种 CSS 缩写属性。
style.properties.padding-top.description: CSS 属性 padding-top 是指一个元素在内边距区域（padding area）中上方的高度。内边距（padding）是指一个元素的内容和边框之间的区域。和外边距（margin）不同，内边距（padding）是不允许有负值的。内边距（padding）可以用四个值声明一个元素的四个方向的内边距（paddings），这是一种 CSS 缩写属性。
style.properties.padding.description: padding CSS 简写属性控制元素所有四条边的内边距区域。
style.properties.page-break-after.descri: page-break-after CSS 属性调整当前元素之后的分页符。
style.properties.page-break-after.values: 始终在元素后强制分页。
初始值。自动分页符（既不强制也不禁止）。
避免在元素后出现分页符。
在元素之后足够的分页符，一直到一张空白的左页为止。
If pages progress left-to-right, then this acts like right. If pages progress right-to-left, then this acts like left.
在元素之后足够的分页符，一直到一张空白的右页为止。
If pages progress left-to-right, then this acts like left. If pages progress right-to-left, then this acts like right.
style.properties.page-break-before.descr: The page-break-before CSS property adjusts page breaks before the current element.
style.properties.page-break-before.value: Always force page breaks before the element.
Initial value. Automatic page breaks (neither forced nor forbidden).
Avoid page breaks before the element.
Force page breaks before the element so that the next page is formatted as a left page. It's the page placed on the left side of the spine of the book or the back side of the page in duplex printing.
If pages progress left-to-right, then this acts like right. If pages progress right-to-left, then this acts like left.

Force page breaks before the element so that the next page is formatted as a right page. It's the page placed on the right side of the spine of the book or the front side of the page in duplex printing.
If pages progress left-to-right, then this acts like left. If pages progress right-to-left, then this acts like right.
style.properties.page-break-inside.descr: The page-break-inside CSS property adjusts page breaks inside the current element.
style.properties.page-break-inside.value: Initial value. Automatic page breaks (neither forced nor forbidden).
Avoid page breaks inside the element.
style.properties.page-orientation.descri: The page-orientation CSS descriptor for the @page at-rule controls the rotation of a printed page. It handles the flow of content across pages when the orientation of a page is changed. This behavior differs from the size descriptor in that a user can define the direction in which to rotate the page.
style.properties.page.description: The page CSS property is used to specify the named page, a specific type of page defined by the @page at-rule.
style.properties.page.values.auto.descri: Default value. Use the value of the nearest ancestor with a non-auto value. If no ancestor has a named page value set, the used value for auto is the empty string.
style.properties.paint-order.description: CSS paint-order 属性可以让你控制文本区域和图形绘制的填充和绘制（和 markers）的顺序
style.properties.paint-order.values.fill: 指定一部分或者全部这些属性的渲染顺序
style.properties.paint-order.values.mark: 指定一部分或者全部这些属性的渲染顺序
style.properties.paint-order.values.norm: 用正常的顺序渲染不同的元素
style.properties.paint-order.values.stro: 指定一部分或者全部这些属性的渲染顺序
style.properties.perspective-origin.desc: CSS 属性 perspective-origin 指定了观察者的位置，用作 perspective 属性的消失点。
style.properties.perspective.description: CSS 属性 perspective 指定了观察者与 z=0 平面的距离，使具有三维位置变换的元素产生透视效果。z>0 的三维元素比正常大，而 z<0 时则比正常小，大小程度由该属性的值决定。
style.properties.perspective.values.none: 没有应用 perspective 样式时的默认值。
style.properties.place-content.descripti: place-content 属性是align-content 和 justify-content的简写。使用这两个属性的值可以用于任何的布局情况。
style.properties.place-content.values.ba:
Specifies participation in first- or last-baseline alignment: aligns the alignment baseline of the box’s first or last baseline set with the corresponding baseline in the shared first or last baseline set of all the boxes in its baseline-sharing group.
      The fallback alignment for first baseline is start, the one for last baseline is end.

Specifies participation in first- or last-baseline alignment: aligns the alignment baseline of the box's first or last baseline set with the corresponding baseline in the shared first or last baseline set of all the boxes in its baseline-sharing group.
      The fallback alignment for first baseline is start, the one for last baseline is end.
style.properties.place-content.values.ce: 所有的子元素堆叠在父元素的中间对齐
style.properties.place-content.values.en: 所有的子元素堆叠在父元素上合适的轴线上的终点对齐
style.properties.place-content.values.fi:
Specifies participation in first- or last-baseline alignment: aligns the alignment baseline of the box's first or last baseline set with the corresponding baseline in the shared first or last baseline set of all the boxes in its baseline-sharing group.
      The fallback alignment for first baseline is start, the one for last baseline is end.
style.properties.place-content.values.fl:
所有的子元素堆叠在父元素的主轴或交叉轴上终点对齐，主要取决于 flex-direction 的设置。
      仅适用于 flex 布局的子元素。如果父元素没有设置为 flex，flex-end 将被视为 end

所有的子元素堆叠在父元素的主轴或交叉轴上起点对齐，主要取决于 flex-direction 的设置。
      仅适用于 flex 布局的子元素.。如果父元素没有设置为 flex，flex-start 将被视为 start
style.properties.place-content.values.la:
Specifies participation in first- or last-baseline alignment: aligns the alignment baseline of the box’s first or last baseline set with the corresponding baseline in the shared first or last baseline set of all the boxes in its baseline-sharing group.
      The fallback alignment for first baseline is start, the one for last baseline is end.
style.properties.place-content.values.le: The items are packed flush to each other toward the left edge of the alignment container. If the property’s axis is not parallel with the inline axis, this value behaves like start.
style.properties.place-content.values.ri: The items are packed flush to each other toward the right edge of the alignment container in the appropriate axis. If the property’s axis is not parallel with the inline axis, this value behaves like start.
style.properties.place-content.values.sa: Used alongside an alignment keyword. If the chosen keyword means that the item overflows the alignment container causing data loss, the item is instead aligned as if the alignment mode were start.
style.properties.place-content.values.sp: The items are evenly distributed within the alignment container. The spacing between each pair of adjacent items is the same. The empty space before the first and after the last item equals half of the space between each pair of adjacent items.

The items are evenly distributed within the alignment container. The spacing between each pair of adjacent items is the same. The first item is flush with the main-start edge, and the last item is flush with the main-end edge.

The items are evenly distributed within the alignment container. The spacing between each pair of adjacent items, the main-start edge and the first item, and the main-end edge and the last item, are all exactly the same.
style.properties.place-content.values.st: 所有的子元素堆叠在父元素上合适的轴线上的起点对齐。

If the combined size of the items is less than the size of the alignment container, any auto-sized items have their size increased equally (not proportionally), while still respecting the constraints imposed by max-height/max-width (or equivalent functionality), so that the combined size exactly fills the alignment container
style.properties.place-content.values.un: Used alongside an alignment keyword. Regardless of the relative sizes of the item and alignment container, and regardless of whether overflow which causes data loss might happen, the given alignment value is honored.
style.properties.place-items.description: CSS 中的 place-items 是一个简写属性 ，它允许你在相关的布局（如 Grid 或 Flexbox）中可以同时沿着块级和内联方向对齐元素 (例如：align-items 和 justify-items 属性) 。如果未提供第二个值，则第一个值作为第二个值的默认值。
style.properties.place-items.values.auto: auto 实际的值继承父自元素的 justify-items 值，除非该元素没有父元素或是用了绝对定位。在这些示例中，auto 表示 normal 。
style.properties.place-items.values.base:
指定参与第一个或最后一个基线对齐：元素的第一个或最后一个基线集的对齐基线与基线共享组中所有框共享的第一个或最后一个基线集中相应的基线对齐。
      first baseline 的回退对齐方式为 start ，last baseline 则为 end。
style.properties.place-items.values.cent: 沿着对齐容器的中心对齐。
在适当的轴线上，元素块沿着对齐容器的结束边缘对齐。
style.properties.place-items.values.flex:
对齐方式取决于 flex 容器的的结束方向。（水平和垂直两个方向）
      这只对 flex 布局元素生效，对于不是 flex 容器的子元素，它被视为 end。

对齐方式取决于 flex 容器的的开始方向。（水平和垂直两个方向）
      这只对 flex 布局元素生效，对于不是 flex 容器的子元素，它被视为 start 。
style.properties.place-items.values.last:
指定参与第一个或最后一个基线对齐：元素的第一个或最后一个基线集的对齐基线与基线共享组中所有框共享的第一个或最后一个基线集中相应的基线对齐。
      first baseline 的回退对齐方式为 start ，last baseline 则为 end。
style.properties.place-items.values.left: 沿着对齐容器的左侧对齐，如果属性的轴不与内联轴平行，则该值的行为和 start 类似。
style.properties.place-items.values.norm:
normal 的效果取决于我们使用哪种布局方式：
    
      在块级布局中，normal 和 start 一样。
      在绝对定位布局中，关键字在被替换的绝对定位元素上的行为类似于 start，在所有其他绝对定位的元素上表现类似 stretch。
      在表格单元格布局中，此关键字没有意义，因为该属性被忽略。
      在 flexbox 布局中，此关键字没有意义，因为该属性被忽略。
      在 grid 布局中，此关键字和 stretch 的行为相似，但是具有宽高比和固有尺寸的元素行为和 start 相似。
style.properties.place-items.values.righ: 沿着对齐容器的右侧对齐，如果属性的轴不与内联轴平行，则该值的行为和 start 类似。
style.properties.place-items.values.star: 在适当的轴线上，元素块沿着对齐容器的起始边缘对齐。
style.properties.place-items.values.stre: 如果子项加起来的尺寸小于对齐容器的尺寸，则任何未尺寸为 auto 的项将增加同等的大小（不是按比例），但也会受到 max-height/max-width （或等同的功能）的限制，因此所有项刚好能填满对齐容器。
style.properties.place-self.description: The place-self CSS shorthand property allows you to align an individual item in both the block and inline directions at once (i.e. the align-self and justify-self properties) in a relevant layout system such as Grid or Flexbox. If the second value is not present, the first value is also used for it.
Computes to the parent's align-items value.
style.properties.place-self.values.basel:
Specifies participation in first- or last-baseline alignment: aligns the alignment baseline of the box's first or last baseline set with the corresponding baseline in the shared first or last baseline set of all the boxes in its baseline-sharing group.
      The fallback alignment for first baseline is start, the one for last baseline is end.
style.properties.place-self.values.cente: The flex item's margin box is centered within the line on the cross-axis. If the cross-size of the item is larger than the flex container, it will overflow equally in both directions.
style.properties.place-self.values.first:
Specifies participation in first- or last-baseline alignment: aligns the alignment baseline of the box's first or last baseline set with the corresponding baseline in the shared first or last baseline set of all the boxes in its baseline-sharing group.
      The fallback alignment for first baseline is start, the one for last baseline is end.
style.properties.place-self.values.flex-: The cross-end margin edge of the flex item is flushed with the cross-end edge of the line.
The cross-start margin edge of the flex item is flushed with the cross-start edge of the line.
style.properties.place-self.values.last:
Specifies participation in first- or last-baseline alignment: aligns the alignment baseline of the box's first or last baseline set with the corresponding baseline in the shared first or last baseline set of all the boxes in its baseline-sharing group.
      The fallback alignment for first baseline is start, the one for last baseline is end.
style.properties.place-self.values.norma:
The effect of this keyword is dependent of the layout mode we are in:
    
      In absolutely-positioned layouts, the keyword behaves like start on replaced absolutely-positioned boxes, and as stretch on all other absolutely-positioned boxes.
      In static position of absolutely-positioned layouts, the keyword behaves as stretch.
      For flex items, the keyword behaves as stretch.
      For grid items, this keyword leads to a behavior similar to the one of stretch, except for boxes with an aspect ratio or an intrinsic sizes where it behaves like start.
      The property doesn't apply to block-level boxes, and to table cells.
style.properties.place-self.values.self-: Aligns the items to be flush with the edge of the alignment container corresponding to the item's end side in the cross axis.
Aligns the items to be flush with the edge of the alignment container corresponding to the item's start side in the cross axis.
style.properties.place-self.values.stret: If the combined size of the items along the cross axis is less than the size of the alignment container and the item is auto-sized, its size is increased equally (not proportionally), while still respecting the constraints imposed by max-height/max-width (or equivalent functionality), so that the combined size of all auto-sized items exactly fills the alignment container along the cross axis.
style.properties.pointer-events.descript: pointer-events CSS 属性指定在什么情况下 (如果有) 某个特定的图形元素可以成为鼠标事件的 target (en-US)。
style.properties.pointer-events.values.a: 只适用于 SVG。只有鼠标指针在元素内部或边界时，元素才会成为鼠标事件的目标，fill、stroke和visibility属性的值不影响事件处理。
与pointer-events属性未指定时的表现效果相同，对于 SVG 内容，该值与visiblePainted效果相同
style.properties.pointer-events.values.f: 只适用于 SVG。只有鼠标指针在元素内部时，元素才会成为鼠标事件的目标，fill和visibility属性的值不影响事件处理。
style.properties.pointer-events.values.n: 元素永远不会成为鼠标事件的target (en-US)。但是，当其后代元素的pointer-events属性指定其他值时，鼠标事件可以指向后代元素，在这种情况下，鼠标事件将在捕获或冒泡阶段触发父元素的事件侦听器。
style.properties.pointer-events.values.p:
只适用于 SVG。元素只有在以下情况才会成为鼠标事件的目标：
    
      鼠标指针在元素内部，且fill属性指定了none之外的值
      鼠标指针在元素边界上，且stroke属性指定了none之外的值
    
    visibility属性的值不影响事件处理。
style.properties.pointer-events.values.s: 只适用于 SVG。只有鼠标指针在元素边界上时，元素才会成为鼠标事件的目标，stroke和visibility属性的值不影响事件处理。
style.properties.pointer-events.values.v: 只适用于 SVG。只有在元素visibility属性值为visible，且鼠标指针在元素内部或边界时，元素才会成为鼠标事件的目标，fill和stroke属性的值不影响事件处理。
只适用于 SVG。只有在元素visibility属性值为visible，且鼠标指针在元素内部时，元素才会成为鼠标事件的目标，fill属性的值不影响事件处理。

只适用于 SVG。元素只有在以下情况才会成为鼠标事件的目标：
    
      visibility属性值为visible，且鼠标指针在元素内部，且fill属性指定了none之外的值
      visibility属性值为visible，鼠标指针在元素边界上，且stroke属性指定了none之外的值
只适用于 SVG。只有在元素visibility属性值为visible，且鼠标指针在元素边界时，元素才会成为鼠标事件的目标，stroke属性的值不影响事件处理。
style.properties.position.description: CSS position 属性用于指定一个元素在文档中的定位方式。top，right，bottom 和 left 属性则决定了该元素的最终位置。
style.properties.position.values.-ms-pag: The box's position is calculated according to the 'absolute' model.
style.properties.position.values.-webkit: The box's position is calculated according to the normal flow. Then the box is offset relative to its flow root and containing block and in all cases, including table elements, does not affect the position of any following boxes.
style.properties.position.values.absolut: 元素会被移出正常文档流，并不为元素预留空间，通过指定元素相对于最近的非 static 定位祖先元素的偏移，来确定元素位置。绝对定位的元素可以设置外边距（margins），且不会与其他边距合并。
style.properties.position.values.fixed.d: 元素会被移出正常文档流，并不为元素预留空间，而是通过指定元素相对于屏幕视口（viewport）的位置来指定元素位置。元素的位置在屏幕滚动时不会改变。打印时，元素会出现在的每页的固定位置。fixed 属性会创建新的层叠上下文。当元素祖先的 transform、perspective、filter 或 backdrop-filter 属性非 none 时，容器由视口改为该祖先。
style.properties.position.values.relativ: 该关键字下，元素先放置在未添加定位时的位置，再在不改变页面布局的前提下调整元素位置（因此会在此元素未添加定位时所在位置留下空白）。position:relative 对 table-*-group, table-row, table-column, table-cell, table-caption 元素无效。
该关键字指定元素使用正常的布局行为，即元素在文档常规流中当前的布局位置。此时 top, right, bottom, left 和 z-index 属性无效。
元素根据正常文档流进行定位，然后相对它的最近滚动祖先（nearest scrolling ancestor）和 containing block（最近块级祖先 nearest block-level ancestor），包括 table-related 元素，基于 top、right、bottom 和 left 的值进行偏移。偏移值不会影响任何其他元素的位置。
      该值总是创建一个新的层叠上下文（stacking context）。注意，一个 sticky 元素会“固定”在离它最近的一个拥有“滚动机制”的祖先上（当该祖先的 overflow 是 hidden、scroll、auto 或 overlay 时），即便这个祖先不是最近的真实可滚动祖先。这有效地抑制了任何“sticky”行为（详情见 Github issue on W3C CSSWG）。
style.properties.prefix.description: @counter-style descriptor. Specifies a <symbol> that is prepended to the marker representation.
style.properties.print-color-adjust.desc:
The print-color-adjust CSS property sets what, if anything, the user agent may do to optimize the appearance of the element on the output device.
  By default, the browser is allowed to make any adjustments to the element's appearance it determines to be necessary and prudent given the type and capabilities of the output device.
style.properties.print-color-adjust.valu:
The user agent is allowed to make adjustments to the element as it deems appropriate and prudent in order to optimize the output for the device it's being rendered for.
      For example, when printing, a browser might opt to leave out all background images and to adjust text colors to be sure the contrast is optimized for reading on white paper.
      This is the default.

The element's content has been specifically and carefully crafted to use colors, images, and styles in a thoughtful and/or important way, such that being altered by the browser might actually make things worse rather than better.
      The appearance of the content should not be changed except by the user's request.
      For example, a page might include a list of information with rows whose background colors alternate between white and a light grey.
      Removing the background color would decrease the legibility of the content.
style.properties.quotes.description: quotes CSS 属性用于设置引号的样式。
style.properties.quotes.values.[<string>: 一组或者多组 <string> 的值对应 open-quote and close-quote. 第一对表示引号的外层，第二对表示第一个嵌套层，下一对表示第三层，依此类推。
style.properties.quotes.values.auto.desc: 用适当的引号，基于在所选元素上设置的任何语言值（例如，通过 lang 属性）。
style.properties.quotes.values.none.desc: content 属性的值 open-quote 和 close-quote 将不会展示引号。
style.properties.range.description: @counter-style descriptor. Defines the ranges over which the counter style is defined.
style.properties.range.values.auto.descr: The range depends on the counter system.
style.properties.range.values.infinite.d: If used as the first value in a range, it represents negative infinity; if used as the second value, it represents positive infinity.
style.properties.resize.description: CSS 属性 resize 用于设置元素是否可调整尺寸，以及可调整的方向。
style.properties.resize.values.block.des: 元素显示可让用户沿块向（水平或竖直方向之一，取决于 writing-mode 和 direction 的值）调整其尺寸的机制。
style.properties.resize.values.both.desc: 元素显示可让用户调整其尺寸的机制，可沿水平和竖直方向调整尺寸。
style.properties.resize.values.horizonta: 元素显示可让用户沿水平方向调整其尺寸的机制。
style.properties.resize.values.inline.de: 元素显示可让用户沿行向（水平或竖直方向之一，取决于 writing-mode 和 direction 的值）调整其尺寸的机制。
style.properties.resize.values.none.desc: 元素不提供用户可控的调整其尺寸的方法。
元素显示可让用户沿竖直方向调整其尺寸的机制。
style.properties.right.description: right CSS 属性定义了定位元素的右外边距边界与其包含块右边界之间的偏移，非定位元素设置此属性无效。
style.properties.right.values.auto.descr:
这个关键字表示：
    
      对于绝对定位元素，元素将忽略此属性而以 left 属性为准，如果此时设置 width: auto，将基于内容需要的宽度设置宽度；如果 left 也为 auto 的话，元素的水平位置就是它假如作为静态（即 static）元素时该在的位置。
      对于相对定位元素，元素相对正常位置的偏移量将基于 left 属性；如果 left 也为 auto 的话，元素将不会有偏移。
style.properties.right.values.inherit.de: 这个关键字表示该值与其父元素（可能不是它的包含块）的计算值相同。对这个计算值的处理将和它原本为 <length>、<percentage> 或 auto 一样。
style.properties.rotate.description: rotate 属性允许你单独设置 transform 的旋转属性。这种映射方式可以让我们更方便的设置我们想要的效果，并且避免了简写形式需要记忆属性顺序的不方便之处。
style.properties.row-gap.description: row-gap 该 CSS 属性用来设置行元素之间的间隙（gutter）大小。
style.properties.ruby-align.description: The ruby-align CSS property defines the distribution of the different ruby elements over the base.
The user agent determines how the ruby contents are aligned. This is the initial value.
style.properties.ruby-align.values.cente: Is a keyword indicating that the ruby will be aligned at the middle of the base text.
style.properties.ruby-align.values.distr: If the width of the ruby text is smaller than that of the base, then the ruby text contents are evenly distributed across the width of the base, with the first and last ruby text glyphs lining up with the corresponding first and last base glyphs. If the width of the ruby text is at least the width of the base, then the letters of the base are evenly distributed across the width of the ruby text.

If the width of the ruby text is smaller than that of the base, then the ruby text contents are evenly distributed across the width of the base, with a certain amount of white space preceding the first and following the last character in the ruby text. That amount of white space is normally equal to half the amount of inter-character space of the ruby text.
The ruby text content is aligned with the start edge of the base.
style.properties.ruby-align.values.line-: If the ruby text is not adjacent to a line edge, it is aligned as in 'auto'. If it is adjacent to a line edge, then it is still aligned as in auto, but the side of the ruby text that touches the end of the line is lined up with the corresponding edge of the base.
style.properties.ruby-align.values.right: The ruby text content is aligned with the end edge of the base.
style.properties.ruby-align.values.space: Is a keyword indicating that the extra space will be distributed between the elements of the ruby, and around it.
Is a keyword indicating that the extra space will be distributed between the elements of the ruby.
style.properties.ruby-align.values.start: Is a keyword indicating that the ruby will be aligned with the start of the base text.
style.properties.ruby-merge.description: This property controls how ruby annotation boxes should be rendered when there are more than one in a ruby container box: whether each pair should be kept separate, the annotations should be collapsed and rendered as a group, or the separation should be determined based on the space available.
style.properties.ruby-overhang.descripti: Determines whether, and on which side, ruby text is allowed to partially overhang any adjacent text in addition to its own base, when the ruby text is wider than the ruby base.
style.properties.ruby-overhang.values.au: The ruby text can overhang text adjacent to the base on either side. This is the initial value.
style.properties.ruby-overhang.values.en: The ruby text can overhang the text that follows it.
style.properties.ruby-overhang.values.no: The ruby text cannot overhang any text adjacent to its base, only its own base.
style.properties.ruby-overhang.values.st: The ruby text can overhang the text that precedes it.
style.properties.ruby-position.descripti: The ruby-position CSS property defines the position of a ruby element relatives to its base element. It can be positioned over the element (over), under it (under), or between the characters on their right side (inter-character).
style.properties.ruby-position.values.af: The ruby text appears after the base. This is a relatively rare setting used in ideographic East Asian writing systems, most easily found in educational text.
style.properties.ruby-position.values.al: Is a keyword indicating that the ruby alternates between over and under, when there are multiple levels of annotation.
style.properties.ruby-position.values.be: The ruby text appears before the base. This is the most common setting used in ideographic East Asian writing systems.
style.properties.ruby-position.values.in: Is a keyword indicating that the ruby has to be placed between the different characters.
style.properties.ruby-position.values.ov: Is a keyword indicating that the ruby has to be placed over the main text for horizontal scripts and right to it for vertical scripts.
style.properties.ruby-position.values.ri: The ruby text appears on the right of the base. Unlike 'before' and 'after', this value is not relative to the text flow direction.
style.properties.ruby-position.values.un: Is a keyword indicating that the ruby has to be placed under the main text for horizontal scripts and left to it for vertical scripts.
style.properties.ruby-span.description: Determines whether, and on which side, ruby text is allowed to partially overhang any adjacent text in addition to its own base, when the ruby text is wider than the ruby base.
style.properties.ruby-span.values.attr(x: The value of attribute 'x' is a string value. The string value is evaluated as a <number> to determine the number of ruby base elements to be spanned by the annotation element.
style.properties.ruby-span.values.none.d: No spanning. The computed value is '1'.
style.properties.scale.description: CSS 属性 scale 允许你可以分别且独立地指定 CSS 属性 transform 缩放的比例。这更好地映射到典型的 UI（用户界面）用法中，并免去了在指定变换值时必须记住变换函数的精确顺序的麻烦。
style.properties.scroll-behavior.descrip: 当用户手动导航或者 CSSOM scrolling API 触发滚动操作时，CSS 属性 scroll-behavior 为一个滚动框指定滚动行为，其他任何的滚动，例如那些由于用户行为而产生的滚动，不受这个属性的影响。在根元素中指定这个属性时，它反而适用于视窗。
滚动框通过一个用户代理预定义的时长、使用预定义的时间函数，来实现平稳的滚动，用户代理应遵循其平台的约定，如果有的话。
style.properties.scroll-margin-block-end: scroll-margin-block-end 属性定义了滚动吸附区域在的块末外边距，此区域用于将此盒吸附至滚动口。滚动吸附区域的确定方法为：取变换后的边框盒，求其矩形包围盒（与滚动容器的坐标空间中的轴对齐），再加上指定的外边距。
style.properties.scroll-margin-block-sta: scroll-margin-block-start 属性定义了滚动吸附区域在的块首外边距，此区域用于将此盒吸附至滚动口。滚动吸附区域的确定方法为：取变换后的边框盒，求其矩形包围盒（与滚动容器的坐标空间中的轴对齐），再加上指定的外边距。
style.properties.scroll-margin-block.des: 简写属性 scroll-margin-block 设置了元素的块向滚动外边距。
style.properties.scroll-margin-bottom.de: scroll-margin-bottom 属性定义了滚动吸附区域的下外边距，此区域用于将此盒吸附至滚动口。滚动吸附区域的确定方法为：取变换后的边框盒，求其矩形包围盒（与滚动容器的坐标空间中的轴对齐），再加上指定的外边距。
style.properties.scroll-margin-inline-en: scroll-margin-inline-end 属性定义了滚动吸附区域的行末外边距，此区域用于将此盒吸附至滚动口。滚动吸附区域的确定方法为：取变换后的边框盒，求其矩形包围盒（与滚动容器的坐标空间中的轴对齐），再加上指定的外边距。
style.properties.scroll-margin-inline-st: scroll-margin-inline-start 属性定义了滚动吸附区域的行首外边距，此区域用于将此盒吸附至滚动口。滚动吸附区域的确定方法为：取变换后的边框盒，求其矩形包围盒（与滚动容器的坐标空间中的轴对齐），再加上指定的外边距。
style.properties.scroll-margin-inline.de: 简写属性 scroll-margin-inline 设置了元素的行向滚动外边距。
style.properties.scroll-margin-left.desc: scroll-margin-left 属性定义了滚动吸附区域的左外边距，此区域用于将此盒吸附至滚动口。滚动吸附区域的确定方法为：取变换后的边框盒，求其矩形包围盒（与滚动容器的坐标空间中的轴对齐），再加上指定的外边距。
style.properties.scroll-margin-right.des: scroll-margin-right 属性定义了滚动吸附区域的右外边距，此区域用于将此盒吸附至滚动口。滚动吸附区域的确定方法为：取变换后的边框盒，求其矩形包围盒（与滚动容器的坐标空间中的轴对齐），再加上指定的外边距。
style.properties.scroll-margin-top.descr: scroll-margin-top 属性定义了滚动吸附区域的上外边距，此区域用于将此盒吸附至滚动口。滚动吸附区域的确定方法为：取变换后的边框盒，求其矩形包围盒（与滚动容器的坐标空间中的轴对齐），再加上指定的外边距。
style.properties.scroll-margin.descripti: 简写属性 scroll-margin 同时设置元素的所有滚动外边距，其赋值方式较为类似 margin 属性为元素外边距赋值的方式。
style.properties.scroll-padding-block-en: scroll-padding-block-end 属性定义了滚动口的最优视区——用于在用户视野中放置内容的目标区域——的块末内边距。作者由此得以排除滚动口被其他内容（如固定定位的工具栏或侧边栏）所遮挡的区域，或在目标元素与滚动口的边之间留出更多余地。
此内边距由用户代理所决定。此值通常为 0px，但用户代理可检测非零值是否更合理并另行处理。
style.properties.scroll-padding-block-st: scroll-padding-block-start 属性定义了滚动口的最优视区——用于在用户视野中放置内容的目标区域——的块首内边距。作者由此得以排除滚动口被其他内容（如固定定位的工具栏或侧边栏）所遮挡的区域，或在目标元素与滚动口的边之间留出更多余地。
此内边距由用户代理所决定。此值通常为 0px，但用户代理可检测非零值是否更合理并另行处理。
style.properties.scroll-padding-block.de: 简写属性 scroll-padding-block 设置了元素的块向滚动内边距。
style.properties.scroll-padding-block.va: 此内边距由用户代理所决定。此值通常为 0px，但用户代理可检测非零值是否更合理并另行处理。
style.properties.scroll-padding-bottom.d: scroll-padding-bottom 属性定义了滚动口的最优视区——用于在用户视野中放置内容的目标区域——的下内边距。作者由此得以排除滚动口被其他内容（如固定定位的工具栏或侧边栏）所遮挡的区域，或在目标元素与滚动口的边之间留出更多余地。
style.properties.scroll-padding-bottom.v: 此内边距由用户代理所决定。此值通常为 0px，但用户代理可检测非零值是否更合理并另行处理。
style.properties.scroll-padding-inline-e: scroll-padding-inline-end 属性定义了滚动口的最优视区——用于在用户视野中放置内容的目标区域——的行末内边距。作者由此得以排除滚动口被其他内容（如固定定位的工具栏或侧边栏）所遮挡的区域，或在目标元素与滚动口的边之间留出更多余地。
此内边距由用户代理所决定。此值通常为 0px，但用户代理可检测非零值是否更合理并另行处理。
style.properties.scroll-padding-inline-s: scroll-padding-inline-start 属性定义了滚动口的最优视区——用于在用户视野中放置内容的目标区域——的行首内边距。作者由此得以排除滚动口被其他内容（如固定定位的工具栏或侧边栏）所遮挡的区域，或在目标元素与滚动口的边之间留出更多余地。
此内边距由用户代理所决定。此值通常为 0px，但用户代理可检测非零值是否更合理并另行处理。
style.properties.scroll-padding-inline.d: 简写属性 scroll-padding-inline 设置了元素的行向滚动内边距。
style.properties.scroll-padding-inline.v: 此内边距由用户代理所决定。此值通常为 0px，但用户代理可检测非零值是否更合理并另行处理。
style.properties.scroll-padding-left.des: scroll-padding-left 属性定义了滚动口的最优视区——用于在用户视野中放置内容的目标区域——的左内边距。作者由此得以排除滚动口被其他内容（如固定定位的工具栏或侧边栏）所遮挡的区域，或在目标元素与滚动口的边之间留出更多余地。
style.properties.scroll-padding-left.val: 此内边距由用户代理所决定。此值通常为 0px，但用户代理可检测非零值是否更合理并另行处理。
style.properties.scroll-padding-right.de: scroll-padding-right 属性定义了滚动口的最优视区——用于在用户视野中放置内容的目标区域——的右内边距。作者由此得以排除滚动口被其他内容（如固定定位的工具栏或侧边栏）所遮挡的区域，或在目标元素与滚动口的边之间留出更多余地。
style.properties.scroll-padding-right.va: 此内边距由用户代理所决定。此值通常为 0px，但用户代理可检测非零值是否更合理并另行处理。
style.properties.scroll-padding-top.desc: scroll-padding-top 属性定义了滚动口的最优视区——用于在用户视野中放置内容的目标区域——的上内边距。作者由此得以排除滚动口被其他内容（如固定定位的工具栏或侧边栏）所遮挡的区域，或在目标元素与滚动口的边之间留出更多余地。
style.properties.scroll-padding-top.valu: 此内边距由用户代理所决定。此值通常为 0px，但用户代理可检测非零值是否更合理并另行处理。
style.properties.scroll-padding.descript: 简写属性 scroll-padding 同时设置元素的所有滚动内边距，其赋值方式较为类似 padding 属性为元素内边距赋值的方式。
style.properties.scroll-padding.values.a: 此内边距由用户代理所决定。此值通常为 0px，但用户代理可检测非零值是否更合理并另行处理。
style.properties.scroll-snap-align.descr: scroll-snap-align 属性将盒子的吸附位置指定为其吸附区域（作为对齐对象）在其吸附容器的吸附口（作为对齐容器）中的对齐方式。其两值分别指定了在块向轴盒行向轴上的吸附对齐方式。若仅指定一值，则第二值默认为同一值。
style.properties.scroll-snap-align.value: 此盒的滚动吸附区域在滚动容器的吸附口中的居中对齐为此轴上的吸附位置。
此盒的滚动吸附区域在滚动容器的吸附口中的末对齐为此轴上的吸附位置。
此盒在此轴上未定义吸附位置。
此盒的滚动吸附区域在滚动容器的吸附口中的首对齐为此轴上的吸附位置。
Defines the x and y coordinate within the element which will align with the nearest ancestor scroll container's snap-destination for the respective axis.
Specifies that this element does not contribute a snap point.
style.properties.scroll-snap-destination: Define the x and y coordinate within the scroll container's visual viewport which element snap points will align with.
style.properties.scroll-snap-points-x.de: Defines the positioning of snap points along the x axis of the scroll container it is applied to.
style.properties.scroll-snap-points-x.va: No snap points are defined by this scroll container.
Defines an interval at which snap points are defined, starting from the container's relevant start edge.
style.properties.scroll-snap-points-y.de: Defines the positioning of snap points along the y axis of the scroll container it is applied to.
style.properties.scroll-snap-points-y.va: No snap points are defined by this scroll container.
Defines an interval at which snap points are defined, starting from the container's relevant start edge.
style.properties.scroll-snap-stop.descri: CSS 属性 scroll-snap-stop 定义了滚动容器是否可“越过”吸附位置。
style.properties.scroll-snap-stop.values: 滚动容器不得“越过”吸附位置，必须吸附至此元素的第一个吸附位置。
在滚动此元素的滚动容器的可见视口时，滚动容器可“越过”吸附位置。
style.properties.scroll-snap-type-x.desc:
The scroll-snap-type-x CSS property defines how strictly snap points are enforced on the horizontal axis of the scroll container in case there is one.

Specifying any precise animations or physics used to enforce those snap points is not covered by this property but instead left up to the user agent.
style.properties.scroll-snap-type-y.desc:
The scroll-snap-type-y CSS property defines how strictly snap points are enforced on the vertical axis of the scroll container in case there is one.

Specifying any precise animations or physics used to enforce those snap points is not covered by this property but instead left up to the user agent.
style.properties.scroll-snap-type.descri: CSS 属性 scroll-snap-type 设置了在有滚动容器的情形下吸附至吸附点的严格程度。
style.properties.scroll-snap-type.values: 滚动容器仅在其块向轴上吸附至吸附位置。
滚动容器在其两轴上独立地吸附至吸附位置（可能在各轴上吸附至不同的元素）。
滚动容器仅在其行向轴上吸附至吸附位置。
若滚动容器当前未在滚动，则其可见视口必须吸附至吸附位置。
在滚动此滚动容器的可见视口时，必须忽略吸附点。
若滚动容器当前未在滚动，则其可见视口可以吸附至吸附位置。是否吸附由用户代理根据滚动参数决定。若指定了吸附轴，则此为默认的吸附程度。
滚动容器仅在其横轴上吸附至吸附位置。
滚动容器仅在其纵轴上吸附至吸附位置。
style.properties.scroll-timeline-axis.de: The scroll-timeline-axis CSS property is used to specify the scrollbar direction that will be used to provide the timeline for a named scroll progress timeline animation, which is progressed through by scrolling a scrollable element (scroller) between top and bottom (or left and right). scroll-timeline is set on the scroller that will provide the timeline. See CSS scroll-driven animations for more details.
style.properties.scroll-timeline-axis.va: The scrollbar on the block axis of the scroller element, which is the axis in the direction perpendicular to the flow of text within a line. For horizontal writing modes, such as standard English, this is the same as y, while for vertical writing modes, it is the same as x. This is the default value.

The scrollbar on the inline axis of the scroller element, which is the axis in the direction parallel to the flow of text in a line. For horizontal writing modes, this is the same as x, while for vertical writing modes, this is the same as y.
The scrollbar on the horizontal axis of the scroller element.
The scrollbar on the vertical axis of the scroller element.
style.properties.scroll-timeline-name.de: The scroll-timeline-name CSS property is used to define the name of a named scroll progress timeline, which is progressed through by scrolling a scrollable element (scroller) between top and bottom (or left and right). scroll-timeline-name is set on the scroller that will provide the timeline.
style.properties.scroll-timeline.descrip: The scroll-timeline CSS shorthand property is used to define a named scroll progress timeline, which is progressed through by scrolling a scrollable element (scroller) between top and bottom (or left and right). scroll-timeline is set on the scroller that will provide the timeline. The starting scroll position represents 0% progress and the ending scroll position represents 100% progress. If the 0% position and 100% position coincide (i.e., the scroll container has no overflow to scroll), the timeline is inactive.
style.properties.scrollbar-3dlight-color: Determines the color of the top and left edges of the scroll box and scroll arrows of a scroll bar.
style.properties.scrollbar-arrow-color.d: Determines the color of the arrow elements of a scroll arrow.
style.properties.scrollbar-base-color.de: Determines the color of the main elements of a scroll bar, which include the scroll box, track, and scroll arrows.
style.properties.scrollbar-color.descrip: **scrollbar-color**该CSS属性设置滚动条轨道和拇指的颜色
